desc: Nice hotel with good restaurant. Ambiance is good but I am not happy with the fact we had to locate our room alone. The waiting time to be checked in was too long. Cleaning of the room is 100%, she’s punctual and smart and friendly. No enough chairs at the lobby for guests to sit while waiting to be checked in

title: Great stay for family
desc: Stayed here for long weekend. Children love the size of room. View is great. Staff is great particularly Vincent at concierge. Awesome weekend all around at this hotel. Check in and check out were smooth

title: terrible staff
desc: very small wash room and staff attitude not good.will not recommended any one. not value for money. Not much option for vegetarian and rooms are not good also bathroom is worse. its like waste of money

title: Good place to unwind after a loaded day
desc: Best Location Advantage-well connected to key areas, bus station and tube - just a hop away, Great views, Cleanliness at peak, Nice decors, comfortable rooms, plenty of elevators to cut the wait, and good amenities. People touch points could be better by a point.

title: Disappointed
desc: I will not recommend this hotel. far from other restaurants and other places. room is very dirty and old. i got bug bites during our stay. bathroom is dirty with flies or insects flying in the shower area. i saw hair in the blower stand.

title: Stay
desc: In general staff are not very polite or friendly right from breakfast table reservation desk to the person handling luggages.Ta check in/checkout process is very poorly managed.Despite of having breakfast included the staff handing breakfast table reservation told us it wasn’t on the 1st day.We had to carry our own luggage with no help from our room to the lobby during checkout as staff was “too busy”.The sofa in the room was torn from one place.We called the room service numbers many times but no one ever picked up.Overall a poor experience.

title: Overcharged $3000 ...be careful !!
desc: We stayed for 2 nights from New Zealand to visit our new grand daughter and were incorrectly charged for 7 and now after numerous emails requesting they refund us for their mistake we have had to lodge a dispute with Amex to get our money back.We actually checked out at front counter and they said they would email our account and once we didn't receive it checked our card on return to New Zealand . They were clearly short staffed as long queues at reception so someone has made a mistake at reception. Our room also smelled damp and of some chemical and we so bad we had to request a room change as it was extremely pungent. We operate a resort ourselves and I am absolutely gobsmacked that a hotel of this size operates in such a poor and unprofessional manner. We will eventually

title: Appalling Service
desc: I wouldn’t recommend this hotel to anyone, very appalling attitude of staff and no worth the money. The rooms are very small for families, we booked 3 three and they put us on different floor, which we couldn’t access to each other, although we requested to be next to each other. You ask for anything you have to wait for a long time and chase them up.

title: Putting Covid behind us
desc: A well above average Hotel with all the amenities we require. A good sized club room, well located on the riverfront. The breakfasts catered to many nationalities with the buffet style. Perhaps the fresh fruit could have been more diverse. In the club lounge Shirley along with Kenneth and Jennifer were exceptional in making our stay memorable. Nothing was too much trouble for them.

title: No indian food in breakfast and in menu
desc: No indian food in breakfast and in menu Breakfast use to close at 10:30 inconsiderate that guests who cam at 10 are eating .. they will just take your plate . Also no much hotel view . The price we paid was of five stars and we got facilities for 3 star hotel

title: Excellent service at Grand Copthorne Waterfront
desc: My family and I recently spent 3 nights at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront. The rooms and beds were very comfortable, and the views were fantastic. The service in the club lounge was especially nice. Thank you to Shirley, Jennifer and Kenneth for taking such good care of us and providing such warm hospitality in the lounge.

title: Still an excellent hotel
desc: I have stayed at the Grand Copthorne many time for business when I travel through Singapore. The staff are very friendly and helpful, and I have enjoyed upgrades to the clubs suites on several occasions. The club lounge is an ideal oasis for relaxing or getting some work done in a quiet and peaceful environment.

title: Excellent stay
desc: We stayed for 7 nights. The staff couldn't do enough for you. Great location right next to the river and a short walk into Robertson and Clarke Quay. The rooms were very adequate and the view was great (17th floor)

title: Great experience
desc: Great service by Ibrahim who was professional and offered good recommendations. Well done. Spread was generous and would definitely be back at Food Capital. Particularly loved the cendol bingsu dessert and the Asian cuisine to showcase for my US business guest.

title: Nice, Clean & comfortable delux room with great river view
desc: Hotel is at great location near Havelock MRT and walk-able distance to Robertson quay. we upgrade room to delux room. Room was clean and bed was comfortable with great view to the waterfront. There was couch for guest to sit and relax with all amenities. bathroom was clean and enough towels.

title: Not bad actually
desc: Price was reasonable for a five star hotel. Just that I always request for high floor but didn’t get it. I’ve stay here for couple of time and all was good. Hopefully they are able to get a convenient store nearby or vending machines

title: Food Capital
desc: Fantastic Spread. Big long leg crab. Sashimi very good standard. Oyster galore. had a surprise birthday cake for my birthday. Nice aircon place. Great view. Good service. Clean environment. Fast service.

title: Great experience
desc: The rooms are tidy and the pool is clean. Also, the meal is unexpectedly delicious. ☺️ Thanks to Anil Singh for the great assistance. I would probably revisit this place again. 🥰 Thank you again!!!!!

title: Nice hotel, but nothing stood out
desc: I booked a 6 night stay at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront hotel and I had a pleasant stay. The staff were friendly and helpful. A few things that were minor inconveniences: -I had one outlet that I could plug my adapter/devices in (luckily it had two USB plugs, so I could charge 3 devices at once) -One of the four curtain handles were missing, but I didn't care too much as it was much easier to open and close the curtain with my hand -The shower door wouldn't close all the way properly, so the door would be slightly ajar during a shower -The closet door would not slide shut all the way and so I used a slipper/sock in between the cracks of the two doors to keep one of the doors shut -The location is not the greatest but it does give you a nice view of the river, which is also

title: Holiday by the river
desc: Great location, lovely hotel with friendly staff. Easy walk to riverside restaurants. Close to main attractions with a bus stop at the door. Beautiful city view from our 24th floor room. We will stay here again.

title: Thank you for the hospitality
desc: My family and I stayed for a few nights during the September school holidays and had a brief, but lovely respite from work. We’ll like to credit the people who made that possible. Foremost, we want to thank Kenneth for his exceptional service. He arranged meticulously for detailed room tours before the stay, the most hassle-free check-in and out, room upgrade as well as dining reservations. I have to say he met our needs and wants very well, a testament to his keen observation of our preferences. There’s more to thank him for but I think it suffices to say: we are impressed by his understated excellence and with him, we always feel that we’re in good hands. The service and offerings at the Club Lounge was the highlight of the stay. Not only was the view most inviting, but

title: Happy hour cocktails in club executive lounge
desc: Amazing hospitality in the executive lounge. Accommodating. friendly staff . Great view. Highly recommend. Good value for money and a very happy way to spend 2 hours. Staff anticipate your needs and are ovely

title: Stay in executive suite & access to club lounge
desc: Had a great time at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel. Service is top notch by Shirley & Jennifer at the Club Lounge. Also leaving a note to Serene - who planned our wedding a year back to ensure we enjoyed our Anniversary stay. Glad to have had our Wedding here at the Grand Ballroom last year. :)

title: Lunch
desc: Nice Paranakan Lunch buffet. Good spread and very worth it. The ambiance is good and clean. The staffs are friendly and helpful especially Me Ibrahim for his awesome service. I have a great experience eating here.

title: 10/10 thanks to Jennifer at club lounge and Rodney for handling our requests well!
desc: Normally, I don’t fancy writing reviews after every staycation but our recent stay at Grand Copthorne prompted me to. Special thanks to Jennifer for her wonderful service in the lounge and Rodney at the reception. My wife and I arrived in the wee hours of the morning after a 17-hr flight, and we were warmly greeted by a lovely boy Rodney, who gave us the best hospitality! He was very polite and accommodating to our requests and even walked us to the elevator after checking us in. We had a room with lounge access which was delightful. We’d like to thank Jennifer for taking care of us whenever we showed up. The service rendered by her was beyond amazing! She was extremely welcoming and friendly. Thank you both once again for making our stay a memorable one! We will

title: Amazing experience at Singapore
desc: Loved the hotel experience and multi cuisine breakfast options. Would love to visit again and stay at Grand Copthorne Hotel and experience the beauty of Singapore while staying in Grand Copthorne hotel

title: Wonderful experience
desc: We had a wonderful experience at the grand Copthorne waterfront hotel. Shirley & Jennifer made our experience extra special with amazing service & friendly service always. They even surprised me with a birthday cake on my birthday which I’ll never forget. Nothing was ever a problem we always had everything we needed, they went to any length to make sure our stay was comfortable & enjoyable. These are the people you want to be working in a hotel to make it memorable & to always have a wonderful stay on holidays. There hospitality & knowledge on servicing customers is beyond 5 star. Thankyou for an unforgettable holiday experience in Singapore

title: Hidden Gem
desc: Rooms were spacious. Staff very efficient and courteous. Breakfast was scrumptious and hotel is conveniently located near bus stops etc. It would have been nice if we had river views but overall all good.

title: Great location and facilities
desc: Great location as it is central to everything. Facilities are great and the restaurant has a great choice of food to suit everyone, All staff were excellent especially as the hotel was extremely busy which was nice to see.

title: Good stay for vaiue
desc: For what you pay - it was a very valuable stay with great amenities and service. Checkin and departure was a seamless process and the stay was enjoyable with good proximity to key areas in Singapore. Only area for improvement I suggest is knowing when the staff will come in to clean + my bedsheets didn’t seem like they were new ones, more so just tidied.

title: Poor condition and cleanliness of rooms
desc: Hotel rooms are apparently due a refurbishment in October 2022. However, the current rooms are very run down and most disappointingly, unclean and full of dust. Issues noted during last stay - dusty rooms, floor has not been dusted enough despite whatever SG clean standard is meant to be. Ripped furniture- leather and cloth covering on chairs Mould on sink joining to the basin Rusty water sprinklers Stains on furniture including bed frame and desk. Badly in need of a refresh and actually maintaining cleanliness standards. Staff are friendly and professional, just let down by the current standards of the rooms. At current prices and positioning as a 5-star hotel, you are probably better off findind something else in Singapore

title: Family Vacation! Pleasant stay I would say!
desc: Overall, I truly enjoyed the stay during my trip to Singapore. Although the hotel has its flaws, I received excellent service especially from Rodney, who perfectly handled my complaint regarding the room. He responded quickly and gave my family and I a great solution which made my stay at this hotel even more memorable. Frankly speaking, I’d only wanted to rate this hotel 3 to 4 stars due to the poor condition of the room but after how calmly and tactfully Rodney handled my complaint, I decided to give you guys 5 stars!

title: Good location
desc: Good location for a business trip to access all but no Restaurant around the hotel. The price was a little higher due to F1 racing, I think. There is no shopping center or restaurant nearby, so it is not a good location to go out late in the evening. So it's not good for tourists, but I want to recommend it to business travelers.

title: One Night Stay
desc: Very impressive hotel when viewed externally upon arrival. Room was small and starting to show it's age. Definitely time for some refresh renovations. Staff were good, but the reservation desk seemed to take a lot of key strokes and a bit of time on check in.

title: Great service!!
desc: Me and my partner were greeted with smiles and great service at the executive lounge and overall we were pleased with everything that Grand Copthorne Waterfront had offered us even gave us a free upgrade to a suite! Thank you for the memorable experience 😁

title: Low level 4 star Hotel - Tired and old Decor. Good location.
desc: I stayed here for 4 nights last week - I was a lil concerned due to recent reviews... But to be honest, I thought it would be worse that what I experienced. The check in process was ok - I was expecting a disaster as I got a check-in email asking what time I would arrive (and a time slot option I should pick) as there were many ppl expected. The first time Ive received anything like this from all of my travels. The rooms were a bit disappointing. Old carpet - the type you dont want to walk on with wet feet.... deliberately darker colored. The shower was pretty bad... looked like it hasnt been upgraded since the 90's. The location of the hotel is its best feature. Close to Henderson and Clark Quay and all of the bars / coffee shops / restaurants etc. The breakfast was

title: Perfect for Indian families
desc: Grand copthorne , waterfront is a beautiful place to anchor your stay in Singapore....it is centrally located and just a walk away from the entertainment hub at clarke quay... The rooms are spacious ... staff is friendly and helpful at all times..even for booking cabs . Highly recommended!!!

title: Fake 5 star hotel
desc: I don’t know how this hotel is rated 5 star , we arrived at 11 pm and no one came to pick our luggage from the taxi we were ok fine then they gave us a twin room smaller than the one we already booked and paid for because there was the big one was not available and they will move us to the bigger room in the morning and this without a compensation , Then the worst thing which is the room itself just have a look at the pics and you be the judge , i would never book this hotel to any one its like paying for 5 star hotel and getting 3 star experience .

title: Luxurious stay with great view and food
desc: We stayed for 7 days at this hotel. The hotel location is perfect and the well connected to local transport. The rooms are big- we stayed on the 24th floor and the view is just breathtaking. The rooms are well maintained, super clean with big bathrooms. Everything was perfect. We absolutely loved our stay here and would recommend others to try as well. The breakfast buffet is amazing with lots of variety and for lunch and dinner you have lots of options along the waterfront where you can get drool worthy Indian dishes as well

title: Average, wouldn’t call this a 5 star hotel!
desc: We booked Grand Copthorne as part of our honeymoon stay in Singapore. First of all, I would just like to say by no means is this a 5 star I would rate it a 3.5 at best. The bathroom was pretty dingy considering, sinks were cracked in our room. A very comfortable bed however. Staff were relatively pleasant however considering we had mentioned it was our honeymoon there were no ‘special treatment’ services given not even a simple towel decoration. This was the first stop of our multi destination and Copthorne were the only hotel who I would say didn’t make us feel special or even congratulate us on our newlywed status. Not a huge deal but would’ve started our honeymoon off in a nice way. Location is very strange.. no close amenities, there is a mall that’s 10 min walk away

title: Great Stay in the heart of city!!
desc: Excellent location and a great clean, friendly hotel. Grand Copthorne waterfront is ideally located in a classic part of Singapore, on the riverfront and very near to business district as well as tourist hotspots. There is a shopping mall, Great World City right next to it.

title: Best service
desc: Kudos to Mr. Paul! He took very good care of us. Made our stay very enjoyable and very pleasant. Thank you for giving us the best service ever. Love the food choices as well. Will definitely stay here again!

title: Lunch at Food Capital
desc: Had a great time at Food Capital.. Service and food was great. Celebrated my mum’s birthday and it was very thoughtful of the restaurant to arrange a cake. Children were also taken care of by the service staff. Special thanks to Mr Ibrahim & Ms Sally for their attentiveness and thoughtfulness

title: Birthday Celebration
desc: Food taste is ok. A lot variety of food selection (Chinese Japanese Indian) Service is very good. The staff is friendly and helpful. Free wine given for signed-up member and free birthday cake. We fell very comfortable. The place is cozy.

title: Avoid. Avoid. Avoid
desc: This hotel is dirty, tired and noisy. And to top it off the staff codnt care less. I'll let the photos do the talking, but in addition cracks in walls, tv remote to the TV that didn't work was flthy. Obviously had not been cleaned in years. Avoid. Avoid. Avoid.

title: Poor experience
desc: Hotel room was not cleaned during check-in; complimentary bed wasnt setup; complimentary gift for kids not provided, staff not friendly at the Executive lounge; staff not available during check out at executive lounge. Poor experience at GCW hotel. Only plus point is the river/city view.

title: Spacious comfortable rooms right on the river
desc: We had three nights at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel. It was a delight to stay there - highly professional staff, great breakfast buffet in the Food Capital restaurant and very comfortable bed and pillows for a restful stop over. The staff are super responsive to any queries you may have and are professional, warm and welcoming. I'd especially like to mention Jennifer and Kenneth, the hosts in the Club Lounge who go over and above to help you enjoy your stay. The Hotel is right on the river and there's plenty of restaurants, bars and cafes within easy walking distance to enjoy riverside dining, if you fancy going out. Dinner at the Tempo restaurant at the Hotel is very good. We enjoyed two meals there. There's also a buffet dinner at Food Capital but we weren't

title: Compliment to Shirley (Good Service)
desc: A very good experience with Shirley and the team (Jennifer) in the evening. Both are friendly, good service and good recommendations for drinks. Good food also. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much.

title: Good experience and beautiful location
desc: Over all it was good experience, their service is responsive and location is superb, but I think it’s time the hotel management spend some money in renovating rooms and electric fitments and try to make rooms more plush and rich

title: Watching Singapore for two days!
desc: Great experience in a wide clean room at 22nd floor with an amazing view on the river and on the skyline. All the persons from the hotel were very kind and helpful with every request, a big thanks to Javin, for the great room received! The two restaurants and bars at the ground floor have a great location outside on the riverside.

title: Amazing service at the Club Room Grand Copthorne
desc: Trip advisor The staff (Kenneth, Shirley and Jennifer) at the Club Room are always very polite, friendly, professional and extremely accommodating. Everyday the staff welcome us with a smile and provide an excellent service that includes a range of delicious hors d’oeuvre and drinks. Our stay at the hotel was to celebrate my wife’s dads 80th birthday with family from England and Australia. On the day of his birthday the pastry chef (Jason) made an amazing cake for him and everyone to enjoy which was appreciated by all. The food and service is always first class - thank you and we look forward to returning to the hotel and the Club Room soon

title: Wedding Anniversary Staycation
desc: we are very pleased to receive warm welcome from Jennifer and Kenneth at the club floor 29th when we came out from the lift and heading towards our room. in addition, great customer service rendered by both of them during our evening cocktail hours at the lounge with beautiful view . Both were attentive and came to us to check on our food & beverages regularly. They also surprised us with a cake, placed it on our room coffee table with written lovely wishes for our wedding anniversary celebration , and signed off by Jennifer. hotel and guests are blessed to serve by two awesome service staffs Kenneth and Jennifer at the club floor area (29th floor). also thank you to the front desk (lobby) staff Mr Halim who have handled my check-in process professionally & smoothly, and

title: Nice stay!
desc: The bed were comfortable and we got good waterfront view! The breakfast was good too! However, there was smell from bathroom and the location is not very close to MRT. The staff were helpful and welcoming. Overall, we had nice stay!

title: Bad experience
desc: Very bad hotel! It was dirty with very bad service and very old rooms! The only good was the breakfast which you can find a lot of things. At 8:30 the cleaning room service rung our bell and wake us up beside we had a “do not disturb”. At the check in they have 2 reservations (2rooms) beside 1. The furniture in the room was very old and dirty and the mattress had something that was really disgusting! You can check the photos

title: Excellent place to stay soon near mrt
desc: Excellent experience with wonderful staff. They were very courteous. There is, however, a small hiccup with the lack of bedside plugs. Nevertheless, 5 star experience and great value for money. Will definitely come back.

title: Terrible experience
desc: Date 8 Sept 2022. Room 2712 suite. Terrible service and horrible experience. I left feedback upon early checkout, staff and manager never followed up. If I was given a free stay, I would not even return to this hotel due to the bad experience

title: 4 star but Needs to try harder
desc: Good location, but hotel service needs to try harder. Service is always lacking. Hotel breakfast needs work. Check in and check out needs work as line is always long. The frequent stay program is a joke.

title: Disappointment
desc: We always loved staying at the hotel as we were always welcome by the staff - concierge team to club lounge team. However, during our recent short stay earlier this month, it has left us a sour feeling. We are prestige member of my millennium and we were being upgraded to club deluxe room (courtesy of club manager Ms S). Things took a downward spiral fast shortly after checking in. We went to the club lounge for some light refreshment drinks and upon stepping out from the lift, Ms J, asked "how can I help you". Whereas Ms S, "welcome in". (2 different treatments, we let it slide as it wasn't a big deal). Now on checking out, this is where it all begin. Ms J, kept on harping we haven't paid for the room when it was all being paid when we booked the hotel. Then mentioned we

title: good
desc: The next will stay in creature comforts when Singapore trip. Especially my room she was using is really good. Room 2611. In addition, her daughter's more convenient to do the event at hotels such as the graduation ceremony can use the good. You will have a better image of the hotel if you get the statement and deposit back.

title: Service
desc: Outstanding service! Shirley (The Club Manager) was really friendly to us and even offered drinks for us to try! I felt really comfortable dining in here. Definitely a thumbs up! Will recommend this!!

title: Grand Copthorne Waterfront Stay
desc: Hotel is catering mostly to group tours. It's really not geared to the independent traveler. The location is good but food and beverage facilities are limited. The lobby feels like a railway station with lots of group tour guests running around and there is no feeling of being in a pleasant and classy hotel lobby.

title: Food Capital
desc: Great view and generally a wide range of food! The seafood are fresh especially the prawns (😍) with a huge variety of desserts and the server are really polite and attentive to our requests, good deal! ☺️

title: Service
desc: very very excellent service! they were really friendly and so so helpful I love the recommendations!! AND THEY ARE SO GORGEOUS 💕💕 especially shirley (the club manager) I really appreciate her kindness

title: Horrible experience ever
desc: We stayed just one night with the hotel. During the night there was a poop/pipe smell coming out of the toilet - unbearable and beyond imagination. I could not use the bathroom and even with the bathroom door closed, impossible to sleep. Smell faded away in the morning. Talked to front desk they just said sorry and charged the fee for a 5 start hotel. Just horrible

title: Very good experience! Recommended!
desc: Good location, excellent breakfast, and outstanding staff. The room is a little dated and has not-so-comfortable beds, but everything is clean and works well. Prices are reasonable considering that it is Singapore. Probably will be my choice if I return to Singapore.

title: Good customer service ( Shirley )
desc: I realised i was late for check out and special thanks to Shiley on her good attitude and allow me to check out without any further charges. Very police & pleasant on customer service and overall nice stay Kudos !!

title: Experience
desc: The spread was great. Seafood was fresh and I made a booking for my girlfriend’s birthday and they gave us a complimentary piece of cake! Thanks to Ibrahim and the staff for the wonderful experience!

title: Superb stay - highly recommend.
desc: Our room was lovely and had a beautiful view over the giver and MBS. The breakfast was superb - really diverse, plenty of it and really good quality. Staff couldn’t do enough for us, checking us in early and even letting us shower in their extra facilities ahead of that after a long flight - and with a biscuit and coffee thrown in too. We’d absolutely stay here again if we’re back in Singapore.

title: Terrible hotel, pathetic service and extremely rude staff. Highly not recommended.
desc: Do not stay at this hotel. The reception staff is pathetic. The room stinks, staff at the reception and the food area or very rude and disrespectful. This hotel doesn’t fit in the category of five star hotels.

title: Epitome of terrible customer service
desc: Terrible!!! Construction work on Sunday starting very early and very noisy. Refused to stop to allow sleeping in beyond 9 am. Housekeeping walked into the room while I was still asleep at 9 am and couldn’t understand English when I said I was still asleep and didn’t want the service then. They didn’t service the room at all that day!! Tried to prep for work on Monday but noise levels from construction work was unbearable. Management agreed to move me to a quieter room but I have to downgrade because the hotel was full????? DON’T STAY HERE!!! Terrible service and management!!

title: Very nice stay
desc: We come to Singapore every year for business and stay for a month (3 of us) for over 30 years and usually stay at the orchard hotel, we fancied a change this year.... All I can say is we will be staying here from now on, the rooms are amazing but the best thing is the staff especially Kumaz on the bar he's ace and will look after you and all you need also ruffa on reception, she's made our stay a pleasure (extremely helpful) cheers guys been a nice time this year 👍

title: Horrible old and worn guest room with a smell
desc: This is far from, not even a 3 star hotel. Horribly old and worn guest room and washroom with a strong smell. No service in the breakfast. The selections in the breakfast are limited and cheap, juices from concentrate, 4 most common and cheap fruits. 2 coffee machines. milk and soya milk from instant powder. no tea or coffee service at all. not recommend to anyone.

title: Very pleasant stay at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront.
desc: Spent a week at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront, Singapore, with my nephew. The room was modern, spacious and clean. A great breakfast, with a great variety of options to please most peoples tastes. Staff, in all areas, were efficient, friendly and helpful. Definately enjoyed my stay.

title: 30th anniversary trip!!
desc: My husband and I planned a trip to Sri Lanka and Maldives for our 30th wedding anniversary, we decided to start with 3 nights in Singapore, as that is where we went on our honeymoon 30 years ago! We booked Grand Copthorne Waterfront because my husband had stayed there a few years ago for business and had a good experience, he also found it to be in a great location! It was!! Very central to the quays and walking distance to shops. On checking in were disappointed to learn that the executive club lounge was closed for renovation, this really should have been something that was mentioned when booking! I booked directly on their website and am a millennium member. As a consequence we needed to have breakfast in the main restaurant, which was crowded and noisy. It was hard to get

title: Poor experience
desc: The room is bad (old, the bathroom is stink (toilet smell) and the room is also stinks (painting smell) “, the restaurant is bad (staff is not helpful), staff in the hotel is fine although they didn’t really help me to sort any problem.

title: Long Stay at Grand Copthorne Waterfront Singapore
desc: Like many hotels, the hotel is in the process of being refurbished, and as a 5* hotel the price per night (lower than others in SG) reflects a recognition by the owners that rooms and facilities need to be refurbished. This is happening. The gym was refurbished during the stay, with work underway floor-by-floor. During a 1 month stay on business, the overall experience was very positive. Due in large part to the staff. The staff really do make a huge difference, and are always engaging, helpful and professional. Special mention must go to Shirley, Jennifer and Kenneth from the Exec Lounge team. They were outstanding during the stay. Verone, too on the front desk was excellent. So, if one recognizes the hotel is mid-refurbishment (not a huge inconvenience) and judge's

title: Superb View, Average Experience, No Wow feel to this hotel property.
desc: This is a Huge Hotel in the city centre. On check in our room was upgraded to a bigger & higher floor with a wonderful view of the city so we just loved it. This room was huge as compared to any other room on the same level. The worst part was there was renovation happening on the floors above which we weren’t aware about due to which there was be drilling & tapping sounds the entire day even in the afternoon this would go on till 6pm everyday which was very very disturbing especially with a 1 year old kid with us. Room service takes long, the Air conditioner wasn’t that good we had to call a technician twice. The breakfast spread was superb lots of variety & delicious too. The staff is not very helpful it’s more like a business hotel where everyone’s always just busy to

title: Mr. Zin
desc: Dear Officer In charge, Very convenient to stay at one bed room appartment during my family trip to singapore. We will come back and stay again when we need to be back to singapore. At that time give us the special rate and more good services. Thanks you in advance.

title: Birthday celebration
desc: Sally project out good service, helpful,friendly. Recommend us to join member to the hotel and get extra discount and the wine to make us so happy. On the other hand also will make us to come back for dinner regularly. Hotel should have more staff like her to make our dinner very enjoyable. Working 12 hour but she still always put on a smile which is something not everyone can do. Thumb up to her. Ansar is a hardworking boy. Helpful and deligent. Should always have staff like him to make customer happy. I am very happy with the service from both Sally and Ansar. Foods are nice and keep up the good work. Second time I went and Sally still give us super duper service. She is a great staff to your hotel. Before she left and she still ask a Malay supervisor to give us to top service

title: Simply the BEST!!!!!!
desc: This hotel is simply the BEST!!!!! In particular I would like to thank Kumar, Karlo and Ismail. Each of those individuals made my stay a wonderful experience. Though I have been a loyal patron of other hotel brands, my new go to place is the Grand Copthorne!!!!

title: Great staff
desc: I stayed at the hotel for 8 nights, and attended a conference held at the hotel. The staff - especially front desk and Tempo bar - were fantastic. Friendly, helpful, efficient. Conference buffet was fab, as was cake selection, buffet breakfast choice extensive, fresh and varied.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Really enjoyed staying here.very secure and comfortable and location is first class. Good breakfast and staff service is very good. Location beside river is wonderful. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a traditional comfortable hotel

title: Exception Experience
desc: Overall experience was exceptional, the room was clean and friendly staff. Smacked in the center of Singapore River, the hotel is very well located. Within walking distance to local food court and range of dining places.. Dinning areas could be small with huge crowd.

title: Dinner at Food Capital
desc: We had an amazing dinner buffet at Food Capital. Good selection of food with great quality! The selection of food is widespread with something for everyone. And not to mention the exceptional service especially by Ibrahim who is friendly and helpful.

title: Things aren't what they seem IE club access and tennis courts!!!!
desc: Booked this hotel to meet with clients and play tennis as they promote the fact they have tennis courts. They were fully booked for 1 month in advance because they rent the courts out to a tennis coach. I also booked this hotel because they have a club lounge and the room I booked has club lounge access. I wanted to work in the club lounge in the mornings but it doesn't open until 1pm. Very very disappointed with this place. Room was over priced by 25%. My stay was after the F1 event.

title: Needs a refurb and a bar that stays open past 10.
desc: We stayed here for the F1 weekend and to visit our son in Singapore, as it was a busy weekend the choices of hotels was limited. We were allocated a room which smelled of damp and soon as we opened the door. Severe evidence on the corner wall and the lampshade in room 1465. Even outside the room the hall carpet was smelly and obviously had some sort of leakage/ personal accident. We were quickly allocated another room 1210. It is in need of a serious refurb, decoration and furniture was in poor condition, not sure why it wasn’t done during lockdown. It did have a great view though. During the F1 weekend, the bar closed 10-45 one night and 10 the next night, for a supposed international 5* hotel. It was a joke. On the plus side the doormen for fabulous and very attentive. This

title: Excellent hotel and staff….
desc: This is our fourth stay at this hotel in the past 10 years and we are very happy to return again and again. Apart from a couple of really minor issues with the room and a failed poolside drinks order (only once), I cannot fault it. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful, especially Shirley, Jennifer and Kenneth on the club level, 29th floor. The pool is nice but was much busier this year, we think because of the increased popularity of Formula One now. The food at Tempo was very good indeed and the bar staff very attentive and friendly. My only wish is that the bar would stay open later. The breakfast selection certainly caters for a wide range of cultures and was very good. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

title: Food Capital Best Buffet with 5 Star Service
desc: Me and my Husband celebrated his Birthday dinner at Food Capital. Dinner is fantastic with the most awesome staff. I would like to highly commended Mr. Ibrahim for being so professional, thoughful with a 5 star service. Grand Copthorne Waterfront is lucky to have him as part of the team. Thank you for giving us the best experience.

title: Birthday celebration
desc: scrumptious food & service from Grissini Restaurant ( birthday dinner celebration) Thank you from the great service from Selina & Patrick for taking good care of us. And not forgetting Shirley for the arranging this dinner ....Everything was so well planned .

title: Service with a Smile
desc: Rooms are slightly run down quite surprised they didn't renovate during the lock down period. But the attitude and services of the staff there reminded me why it was a 5 star. Had such a great experience at the level 29 Executive club where staff indulge us in beverages and food, held a conversation with us

title: Grandcopthorne
desc: Clean and staff were fantastic. A bit far from the city but will be better once new train station opposite opens. The company that owns the hotel lacks integrity and transferred our booking and overcharged us for our room. I won't stay in one of they're hotels again.

title: Average hotel but ok.
desc: Very over priced hotel but it was the racing weekend, but even so too expensive. Clean and tidy rooms. Polite staff. Location not great but easy to get a taxi. Concierge was disappointing as when I arrived with 3 luggage I wasn't welcomed or helped to my room with my luggage, I had to take it up on my own.

title: Very outdated hotel in need of renovations
desc: Hotel is supposed to undergo renovations come November. Do yourself a favour and book elsewhere as the quality and size of the rooms is not worth the price you pay. The only 2 advantages of this hotel is the breakfast buffet and location is on the water where there are plenty of restaurants

title: Great Hotel for Business, Club Level Great, Front Mgr Navin Seh is Great, Service 100!
desc: Highly recommend the Grand Copthorne Waterfront, especially for business travel. Perfect location in Robertson Quay, walking distance to many restaurants / cafes on the waterfront, and also restaurants/cafes downstairs inside the hotel for easy business catch-ups. The Club Level rooms are particular nice and modern, great views, quiet and clean. Solid and enjoyable. Good to relax after a busy day of meetings. Easy access to other parts of the city - everything in a short 3-8 min Grab/GoJek, or you can walk all along Robertson Quay/Clarkson Quay. The Front Desk Manager Navin Seh was particularly helpful for our booking of several rooms and also helping with extending stay. Ended up staying here for additional 5 days. Very professional and helpful. Ask for Navin Seh if you need

title: Great service, but hotel rooms are dated
desc: 5 star review for service staff esp at Club lounge by Shirley and Kenneth, who were attentive and professional, even giving us complimentary cake. Enjoyed the view from the lounge too. However rooms are dated and first room assigned wasn’t ideal, and in need of upgrade. Will prefer newer and more modern rooms.

title: vibrant quite efficient hotel
desc: good location and view from the room's river view. good restaurants specially there seating by the river. walking distance across to shops restaurants and Clark key. good place to relax after a busy day

title: Best service experience ever
desc: A big thanks to your excellent lounge team - Shirley , Jenifer, Kenneth n also to your night managerRodney . Shirley is just amazing in 1 word! Her colleague Jennifer a beautiful sweet lady took good care of us when we came for evening cocktail. Kenneth, a friendly gentleman made sure we were comfortable n well-served at all times. We enjoyed some really nice cold beer. Service at the lounge is a top notch! And Rodney he’s so accommodating n a very nice boy, addressed to all our needs in the middle of the night. We were really moved as he made our long hard days so much better. I was taken aback when told by 1 of the bell captain that he is the night manager,because he has got the look of a kid who will never grow up, very adorable(not an insult but rather a compliment). The

title: Avoid at all costs
desc: What a horrible experience this was. I was automatically downgraded for no reason whatsoever. When I pointed this out to the staff they were incredibly rude and inappropriate trying to place the blame on me even if I obviously had a reservation for a Deluxe room but got given their basic room. I won't go into the details of them making a mistake on my booking and me having to point out that they booked my dates incorrectly by over a month, but then they finally managed to get round to doing their job and downgraded my room selection on their own initiative. I paid for a deluxe room and got a basic room. They were unwilling to give me the room I booked or give me a discount. Instead they said it was my fault and should have flagged it sooner (I raised the issue with them 1 hour

title: Wife birthday dinner at food capitol.
desc: Food was great. Variety was plentiful. However service was what that deserved the compliments. From arrival we were greeted by Annie and she took time to explain the buffet menu and show us the table and even allow us to choose our table and service from sally the manager I think was really attentive. Will come back again.

title: Demi Phillips
desc: What a great experience! The service and staff were so so wonderful! Very friendly and kind and made us feel right at home. The food and cocktails were also just delightful. I will be returning with my family again, thank you so much!

title: Shirley Chng is simply the best
desc: I had a terrible time in Singapore until I met Shirley Chng. I moved hotels twice from 5* top hotels. Came to copthorne to move away from F1 congestion. I can honestly say she is simply amazing effective and made our stay absolutely perfect in every possible way.

title: Great dinner, Great service from Kumar.
desc: We had a great service from a waiter, Kumar. He had great service minded and recommended us very nice choices of meals. The food was great and environment of the restaurant was lively. Nice place for dinner.

title: Great experience
desc: Very friendly staff and very cozy place to eat and discuss about businesses! Kumar had provide excellent care. Thanks to mano and team. Have a great night with my colleagues and we truly enjoy the night

title: Food capita restaurant
desc: I was pleasantly surprised by the service of this restaurant. I visited the restaurant quite a number of times pre-Covid with different group of friends, colleague and also it was the appointed hotel for one of my training courses. The service was mediocre then but now oh my gosh; they have improved so much and it totally exceeded my expectation as the service crew and even their cooks was amazing. The taste of the food also surpassed by leap and bounds as it was so tasty. Lastly, I’m extremely impressed by the service team manager “Sally” as she make an effort to make small talks with diners and to gather their feedback for service improvement. She even proactively promoted her hotel group membership and explain its benefits. It is really hard to find such dedicated

title: Room is very old
desc: Hotel is very old and dark. The room is not well maintained and a lot of the furniture was old and dark. Bathroom is also not cleaned well and not good. Will probably not stay in this hotel again due to the room arrangement.

title: Great Staycation Experience Especially for Our Kiddo
desc: The whole stay was pleasant and because we booked the club room, we get to enjoy the drinks and snacks at the club lounge. We were served by very well-mannered and thoughtful staff on both 15 and 16 Oct. We are very grateful because our 3 year old enjoyed the whole staycation experience which includes the club lounge, swim and breakfast buffet. As this was the same hotel which we held our wedding lunch 16 years ago, this stay was even more meaningful for me and my wife. Thank you Grand Copthorne Waterfront.

title: Good hotel under renovation
desc: Its a big hotel which is under much needed renovation. Staff is not that warm. Its a process driven hotel so nothing is charged ti your room. You may check out without any hassle. Location is Central. Cabs are easy to find. Breakfast was good.

title: Best hotel in Singapore, by far!
desc: First and foremost, a special thanks to Navin Seh for providing excellent service throughout our stay. Nonetheless, the hotel's customer service is excellent and friendly, and they quickly resolve any issues that arise. So don't be concerned if you encounter any difficulties during your stay! Simply notify them, and they will take care of the problem. Second, the location is ideal and convenient, as there is an MRT station directly across the street from the hotel. All it takes is a 5-minute morning walk to start your adventure in Singapore! Third, the gym is well-ventilated and clean! The best part is that all of the machines and equipment are working properly. Aside from that, the gym is open 24 hours a day! So you could use it at 4 a.m. to listen to your favorite song.

title: Grand Copthorne Waterfront is a must. 3rd time here & would come back here again.
desc: Cons- Room seemed smaller than what we’ve had before & it was supposed to be a deluxe room. Mattress so hard have had a sore back all of the holiday. No more excursions can be books here or the little courtesy bus that took you to other malls. That’s a shame. If you like your tea & coffee you only get 2 sachets of coffee & 1 teabag of English tea & 1 uji sencha tea. We went & bought teabags from the supermarket at World City mall. Pros- The room was very clean & you get water bottles everyday. My advice is you get 2 cards so keep a card in the slot at the door to keep the fridge & aircon on. So nice to come back to a cold room. VINCENT is the man you would meet first as he is basically the meet & greet guy that opens the taxi door for you. He also got us a taxi when we needed

title: Superb experience with food capital
desc: Thank you Tracy, Jeef and colleagues for the quality service! Great variety of food choices, from Asian to western! Food quality was amazing, definitely exceeded all our expectations. Highlyy recommended!! Two thumbs up! 👍🏻👍🏻

title: WATER FRONT....?
desc: Have booked for 4 nights with a corporate group, and found that this hotel is standing no where close to the claims. Water front ...is actually a nullah channel at the back side of the hotel...oh yes hotel is in front of that stagnant water. Hotel is an old property have maintenance issues, Operating with poor staff strength, which is directly reflecting on their services. Highly nonprofessional and non cooperative staff...actually robots, least expected in hospitality sector.

title: Comfortable and spacious!
desc: We were hosted our wedding lunch at Red House Seafood and had the opportunity to stay at Grand Copthorne Waterfront for two nights. We were fortunate to receive Shirley's warm hospitality a week prior to checking into the hotel till we checked out. She thoughtfully arranged an early check in and upgraded us to a 1 bedroom apartment, so that we could host our family and friends after the wedding. It was perfect indeed. The room was spacious - kitchenette, dining space, living room, separate bathtub and shower. Shirley also arranged a cake for us and personally gave us a dining voucher. We could sense how much Shirley values providing a positive guest experience and for that, we are very thankful to have stayed at the hotel. The housekeeping staff were also prompt with

title: The smell of damp, rundown not the 5 stars you think it might be
desc: This isn't a 5 star hotel, our room was tired the bedside lights didn't work, the wardrobe light wouldn't switch off as it was broke, there were peanuts on the floor that hadn't been cleaned up from the last guests (they were still around 2 days later after 2 more room services ) and the worst thing ever is the smell, it's smells damp and as you walk down the corridor to the room it got worse and worse. It got to the point I was smelling it on my clothes! The bathroom was so small that the door actually touched the toilet! There was no information about the hotel in the room, apart from a flyer to the tempo bar. And the smell....

title: Perfect for us.
desc: We travelled to Singapore as part of a group participating in the Centaurs Junior rugby tournament. A great hotel, conveniently located near the MTR and a short cab ride from Sentosa, we were able to use it for a staging point for our games and off field exploration. The staff are great, very friendly, and the doorman, Vincent will get you the cab you need or the directions you want with a smile and a wave.

title: amazing!!!
desc: This trip has been one of the most pleasant and wonderful experience our family had. Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel exceeded our expectations. It has bery cozy and comfortable rooms, clean and tidy and the staff are amazing! Jevin at the front desk helped us a lot and was very accomodating. Our overall experience has been great! Will definitely come back and highly recommended! -Bryan and Cait

title: Never visit this property
desc: Worst service Unfriendly staff Impolite Worst room service We have came for family vacations but they made it terrible None of the staff is friendly and doesn’t listen to their clients If you want it for locations Then ok Rest decide yourself

title: Room for improvement
desc: My sister and I stayed here for 1 night in December, and we enjoyed our experience, despite the short stay. The room allocated to us was very spacious, and the view of the city was amazing. The beds were comfortable, the shower was not very strong, but the water was hot. We had complimentary tea, coffee and water. All was well, except for the decor and furniture of both the room and the bathroom. They are all very dated and old, and certainly need an upgrade and refurbishment. Despite that, we find the room to be well cleaned, and the staff to be polite and well trained. We do not mind staying here again in the future, if the rate is reasonable, in line with the quality of comfort provided in the room. From our experience in the room given to us, it certainly doesn't qualify

title: Leisure Stay
desc: 1. Some of the hotel staff (Check In Desk, Concierge & Dining staff) are very rude and not courteous at all. 2. Room has inadequate lighting and not having the power sockets outlets at the right place. 3. Electrical Kettle was kept without being checked.

title: Worth a Visit
desc: Very spacious and grand hotel that’s well kept and clean everywhere. Front desk and housekeeping were very friendly and helpful too! Room furnitures aged beautifully and bed was comfortable. Spacious room with a nice window view helped relax my mind while working. Good restaurants and shopping mall within walking distance from the hotel is a big plus. Would have been a wonderful stay if noise inside hotel was better managed. Room was next to hall of elevators. On the last night, there were loud knocking sounds from the moving elevators and missed a peaceful night rest on the last day. Hope this beautiful hotel will restore its greatness again on my next visit.

title: Decent facilities but dated
desc: Was assigned a room on the 13th floor that looks old and the furnishing were dated as well. Pool at level 6 was not big but there was a separate jacuzzi. Around 10 min walk to great world city which is convenient. Surprisingly the walkway along rooms on level 6 was much newer.

title: Unforgettable wedding experience
desc: Hosted our wedding with Grand Copthorne Waterfront and they really impressed both my wife and myself! Service is top notch and Serene made sure to cover all the small details from helping us plan on the wedding dinner to making sure we had food before heading down for our Banquet as we will be too busy to eat. She also helped to arrange for us to head down to TempoBar to have some drinks the next day! It was so cozy and Kenneth who served us impressed both of us with his hospitality!! The room was excellent as Serene manage to upgrade us to a bigger room and that makes our stay even better! Both Serene and Kenneth really bring hotel experience to the next level, stayed in a lot of hotels before but this time round really exceeded any expectations we had! We would like to

title: Strongly recommended
desc: Good food with great ambience. Would love to visit again and would strongly recommend people for the food. Worth the price . Had a great experience with the staff. Staff are friend and helpful in every way. Cleanliness I would give a 10/10 for the restaurant.

title: Wonderful food and service at Food Capital
desc: Very very friendy and attentive service staff at Food Capital! Food spread was very good and yummy. Totally enjoyed the birthday surprise from the staff. Will definitely be back again for staycaytion with my children!

title: Amazing wedding package and services
desc: Thanks for going beyond and accommodating to our needs. For the staff’s attention to detail and warm hospitality. We are very pleased with the service/package and thanks for letting us enjoy the night worry-free by the smooth executions of the events at night. We also appreciate the upgraded rooms, and had an enjoyable time:)

title: Vincent outdoor concierge
desc: Vincent, the outside concierge, has been extremely helpful during my stay at The Grande Copthorne. He has got taxis for me every day and has been friendly and nothing seems too much trouble for him. Thanks Vincent !!

title: Not a 5-star hotel - desperately needs renovation
desc: Probably it used to be a five-star hotel in the past. Now it’s a shabby annd old looking hotel except the lobby and very expensive restaurants. Rooms are rather small and outdated. Corridors are poorly cleaned. I asked for the late check out for one hour and was answered that the hotel policy is to charge $100. Not a good place to stay in Singapore.

title: Buffet dinner was good
desc: Room decor needs refurbishment as it is very dated, however the bed linen was clean. Bath Towels need replacement as they looked worn off. Bathroom was filled with plenty of fruit flies at the shower exhaust.

title: Wonderful crews and Scrumptious Meal
desc: Manager Ibrahim is friendly, cheerful and the crew service is great. Wonderful food spread with fresh Oyster & Snow crab leg. International dishes are fabulous and scrumptious meal for our Wedding Anniversary. Will definitely return in near future and hope that Ibrahim is still here to serve us. Cheers.

title: Beware CONSTRUCTION WORK ONGOING
desc: If you are planning to be in your room during the day, stay clear until their construction work is finished. Was on floor 23 and the seriously irritating drilling and hammering runs 9am to around 5.45pm daily. The room and hallway decoration is tired and in need of the work that is underway.

title: A Grand Experience
desc: A very pleasing experience to stay at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel. A very nice hotel located in what could be considered the best location in Singapore. Quiet and yet within easy access to transport, dining, shopping facilities and places to visit. Highly recommended.

title: Great business hotel in Singapore
desc: Hotel is a great option for business travellers as it comes with complete amenities and facilities. The hotel also has a lot of conference rooms ideal for meetings and events. Buffet breakfast is superb offering a good variety each day. Location is not ideal for leisure travellers but with the opening of the new MRT station across the hotel, this would make it very accessible. Hotel staff are very accommodating and attentive. They are always helpful.

title: Bad check in service
desc: If have come off from a ling please avoid this hotel at all cause. The staff were not friendly, they were stressed from the check in process as there were many in que. Overall it was not a pleasant experience.

title: Hotelnthat once was
desc: Fikthybrooms and bathroom full of dust, flies and hairs..and probably other filth. Wrote the word dirty in the layer of dust on the towel shelf in the bathroom, the word was still untouched after my checkout 8 days!

title: Hotel cleaning must improve
desc: Hotel needs some improvements the hotel is old and the cleaning was not good. Dust every where in the room ( carpet), behind the furniture, lamps , corridors, and the dining areas. Lighting was also poor.

title: Kumar at the bar & Vincent the taxi help
desc: Thank you Kumar for your courtesy! Highly recommend dealing with Kumar when you are having a drink at Copthorne Waterfront. He made us feel welcomed and created a positive vibe for our whole trip. To a point we were looking forward to having drinks with him. Also a shout out to Vincent at the taxi front. Great customer service!

title: Awesome staff
desc: Great hotel with awesome facilities. The gym and the pool was very nice. The key highlight for us were the staff who provided excellent service. In particular Vincent who helped us book a lot of taxis and also Kumar who looked after us with drinks and ultimately became a good friend. Look out for these guys to help make this a stay for you to remember.

title: Poor Experience in Singapore
desc: For the price per night I mistakenly thought that we would be staying at a at least 4star hotel however as we found out this was not the case. The lobby area is okay but dated, and when we got to our room the disappointment was extreme, the room was very small, the bathroom was not particularly clean, the windows could do with a good clean, the whole room and bathroom could do with a good clean and a new coat of paint because in line with the rest of the hotel it was Tired.

title: F&B Service @ Food Capital
desc: I would like to congratulate the F&B team at Food Capital! It was a full house on a Friday night but the service team was exceptionally professional ! They were so attentive in clearing the tables & many plates, polite, efficient and patient to the demanding crowd. Even the chefs at all the stations were so friendly despite the madness of their turneover . Special mention - Chef Soo Khiang, Service Manager Ibrahim and service hero Justin! Thanks so much & Well Done All !

title: Well maintained
desc: Booked the one-bedroom apartment for family staycation. Room is well maintained, electrical appliances are all working. Requested for early check-in at 1pm and called the hotel before the trip. Couldn’t check in earlier on actual day, so waited for about 2 hours.

title: Thank you Joni, Shirley, Atiqah and Mark for the amazing wedding experience!!
desc: Had my wedding ceremony at this hotel and it was an amazing experience especially with the 2 night stay and club access. Joni helped to coordinate our wedding event from the start and she's been patient and helpful in giving us tips and advice. She was accommodative to our requests and we deeply appreciate it. Thank you for helping us get as much benefits as you can for us. On the day of check in, we were attended by Shirley who greeted and helped us check in, thank you for making us feel so welcomed. On the actual day itself, Atiqah and Mark helped us to run the ROM, Tea ceremony and wedding lunch, and guided us along the way. Thank you both for all the help you gave during the actual day despite being so hectic. The food served during lunch tasted yummy😋 Without the

title: Thank you Joni, Shirley, Atiqah, Mark & crew for a successful wedding event!
desc: I had my wedding lunch & 2 nights stay here! Joni was very helpful, professional yet friendly from the start of planning our wedding details all the way to D-day and after. Thanks for going the extra mile for us!! Shirley checked us in to the hotel and made us feel very welcomed! Atiqah was very helpful to me (bride) , arranging my train to make it easier for me to walk throughout the event, and also communicating with Mark to update us on the progress of the lunch and checking in with us every now and then to make sure everything was to our liking. The banquet food was fresh and yummy! Compliments to the chef. Kudos to the team for making our experience a lovely one❤️

title: Wedding banquet (dinner)
desc: Held the wedding banquet here and it was awesome. The hotel operational team and all the staffs were awesome and helped us to plan it so well. The food presented to our guests were fantastic especially it's layout. We were also given complimentary stay in the hotel after the wedding banquet. Indeed an awesome venue for wedding and staycation.

title: Great food and service from Mr Kumar of Tempo Bar & Grill
desc: We had lunch at Tempo Bar & Grill. The food was great and service from Mr Kumar was fabulous. He made an effort to fulfil our special request. This gesture of his had really made our day. Thanks so much!!!

title: WORTH IT
desc: We really enjoyed our stay here at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel! Beginning with the customer service 11/10! The establishment itself with the cleanliness 11/10! We will definitely come back again. We enjoyed every amenity that was available. We also want to say Thank you to Stacy for our welcome on Christmas we appreciate it.

title: Not so good a hotell.
desc: Not a good hotel. Situated outside everthing. Noice and working from 10-11 o’clock. Ok breakfast, but dusty and not so clean. Impossible to change the room, have to pay cash or by card, inconvenient. This is a hotell I would not recommend to anybody.

title: Christmas/birthday dinner
desc: The service was excellent and Mr kurmar and team went the extra mile to give me a cake for my birthday and he also hunted for a candle,sang the song with us too.i was very touched by what he did.the food there were excellent.

title: Awesome service, food and vibes by the river
desc: Great place just to relax by the recover. Their hot wings were super juicy and crispy, flavourful mushroom soup and awesome pasta. Romantic ambience by nightfall makes great for photo taking with your loved ones. Love it!! Will be back

title: Dinner at Tempo Bar
desc: Ambience is nice and cosy. Food is overall tasty and good. Attended by Mr Kumar who is humourous, friendly and recommended the chilli crab fondue with fried flower roll. Thumbs up! Will definitely recommended Tempo Bar to my friends!

title: Exceptional!!!
desc: I am travelling with my aged family members and my 5 year old kid and all of us really enjoyed our stay here at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel and one more night to go but we have no complaints! We had a great Checkin on the day of arrival and at the front desk we met Anil who assisted us and made the process seamless. The rooms are spacious and clean. I love the "touch" assistance which makes life very easy. The staffs are very courteous except a few. I had a bad encounter with some one who was on duty at the swimming pool. He was very rude and acted very aggressively, which is uncalled for. The breakfast spread is outstanding.We enjoyed every amenity that was available to us. A Big Thank you to Anil, we appreciate all your efforts. We shall definitely recommend this

title: Celebrating our Big Day at Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel
desc: We had chosen the in-hotel restaurant Red House Seafood Restaurant as our lunch reception. From upon reaching a day before our big day to the day we checkout, the attention and help we have gotten from the staff was amazing. The reception team and the team of bellboys were super helpful in helping us with our logistic needs. We've also had the pleasure to have the Guest Experience Manager Shirley Chng to provide her service throughout and we're ever so grateful. Truly was a wonderful experience. She and the team have really gone above and beyond to make our special day even more so special! Will definitely visit again , perhaps on our anniversary.

title: Excellent and Comfortable stay in new room
desc: Excellent hotel and location. We were given their newly renovated rooms and we must say that it was absolutely pleasant and comfortable. Loved their features in the room such as the filtered water tap. Hotel staff were pleasant and friendly. We'll be back again!

title: What a Wonderful World – Grand Copthorne Waterfront
desc: Where can we start? We spent a total of 8 nights in Singapore and all we can say from our arrival until departure is that Singapore is a wonderful place. Our trip to the Grand Copthorne Waterfront on the MRT was super easy and a short walk straight across from the newly opened Havelock MRT (Thomson East Coast Line). The MRT is so easy to use and super convenient to get around. Check In Process We were greeted with a grand entrance way adorned with Christmas decorations and trees. The check in process was online before we arrived in Singapore and the face to face check in was very smooth and took less than one minute and up to the sixth floor we proceeded to our La Resindenzia 1 bedroom suite. We checked in a few hours early to GCW which was no problem for the hotel. We got an

title: Hotel stay review
desc: The TV and air con need to upgrade. Air quality is poor. Bathroom cleanliness need to improve as well. Late checkout only one hour allowance which is very rush. Hotel staff and breakfast spread is very good.

title: Happy Customer
desc: My overall experience from the concierge, front Desk, waiters, chefs, house keeping etc.. was exceptional from the start to the end of my trip.. the hotel facilities up keep & cleanliness was the Best I have ever seen.. the staff treated us like family & we felt at home.. I will highly recommend the hotel to any individuals & families visiting Singapore.

title: New Year Stay
desc: Great stay for the new year, i requested to have a higher floor and the hotel provided a room with view towards marina bay for the fireworks. although not 100% of the fireworks is visible. Although quite pricey as it's a new year night, overall its still good and the newly renovated room is amazing.

title: Mr. Srikanth
desc: Good hotel, near to lot of Western food restaurants. Near to Metro and Bus connections are good. Rooms are quite big and spacious (comparing with other Hotels). Staffs are polite and break fast is excellent. In the BF counter lot of Indian vegetarian items available.

title: Stay at Grand Copthorne Waterfront
desc: Good location for bars, underground and sightseeing (various Quays). Large room, good view, clean with friendly, helpful staff. Recommend Fort Canning, Gardens by the Bay and the observation 'ship'. Recommend staying here.

title: Grand Copthorne waterfront
desc: Very Happy Birthday Celebrate my birthday at Grand Copthorne Waterfront! Impressive service! Thank you Ruffa from reception for the delicious sweets and for giving us a beautiful suite room with a superb view! Overall stay is excellent. Near to train station and mall. Everyone looks happy and greets you. Breakfast spread is good too. Highly recommends quiet birthday celebration in this hotel. Just across Robertson Quay where you find a lot of bars and restaurants.

title: Grand Copthorne. Waterfront
desc: This is a nice hotel well situated on the waterfront which has nice walks and plenty of restaurants. The room was spacious and clean with good views and a comfortable bed. The staff were very helpful especially Claudia. Shirley and Deneal. If I return to Singapore I will stay here again.

title: Great Hotel
desc: The hotel was excellent. Really nice view from upper floor rooms. Good area. Perfect staff, especially Ruffa at the frontdesc. Amazing breakfast. The hotel was under a renevation when we were there, but they had isolated the floors that were under the renevation and also those which were close to it. And they offered another room, if there would be any noise issues. There wasn’t any. Our room would have needed a little update, but I guess that’s why it wasn’t expensive at all. I guess it might be sorted by now because they had the renevation.

title: Wedding banquet and Anniversary stay
desc: We held our wedding celebration at the hotel in 2019, and our wedding coordinator Serene was patient and generous. Everything went smoothly due to her planning and attention to details. We largely also appreciate her still responding to our queries and helping to postpone our anniversary stay all the way to 2022, due to the covid period. She really helped to ease our worries and made the wedding journey at the hotel seamless. During our anniversary stay, both Ruffa and Izan's service were excellent. They were attentive and sincere when serving us at the club lounge. Special props to Ruffa for making sure everything was comfortable for me, especially when learning that I was pregnant and celebrating our anniversary. She left a great impression on me and I would definitely

title: Stay at Grand Copthorne Waterfront hotel
desc: Stayed over at the hotel's new room and attended the New Year countdown party. The room was very clean, welcoming and had really convenient features such as the in-room water filter that provides fresh drinking water without having to boil them and the wireless phone charging station by the bedside. The New Year countdown party was lively and entertaining. Lucky draw prizes were generous too. Special thanks to Shaun (unsure if i got his name correctly, but he was giving out the prizes!) for his great hospitality. He definitely hyped up the atmosphere during the party! Overall it was an enjoyable stay and we'll definitely come back again.

title: Superb hotel with 5 star service and facilities
desc: We had an amazing time in this superb hotel. On day 1 we just asked the Manager Anil for MRT information and he gave us free MRT cards to top up and explained all information. Lavish breakfast spread. We have been spoilt throughout. Nitin at the reception and Verone went out of their way to pamper my daughter's unusual request of marshmallow chocolate dip. Cannot thank all enough.

title: Excellent Team
desc: I would like to compliment Concierge Balan as he impressed me with his passionate and excellent customer service. I noticed that he always placing customer’s interest first. He is professional and very patience. This is what attract me to recommend this hotel to my team members. People Excellent indeed. Kudos to the team too!!

title: Review
desc: Staff are very friendly. Vincent helped us alot in getting cabs. Hope they can install bidets in the bathrooms. Breakfast variety is also very good. Nearby MRT station (Havelock) so it is very accessible.

title: Good experience
desc: Location is good and service is very good Vincent was very helful in finding taxis for us We daced issue with halal food since the restaurant is not halal certificated and staff not aware which food is halal and which food is not halal Overall good experience We noticed noise for renovation during the day

title: Wedding experience was great thanks to GCW.
desc: We held our wedding at GCW over the weekend on the 18th, and are grateful to the staff for helping to pull it off smoothly despite the hiccups. Thanks Serene for working with us the past 10 months, helping to give ideas and guiding us throughout the process. The food tasting was helpful for us as we wanted to ensure the food was to our liking. We appreciated the AV rehearsal as well - special thanks to Izzat who helped walk us through the usage of the equipment and gave us tips as well. Big thanks to Joni for stepping up at the last minute and ensuring that things are in place for the event. We really appreciate her humour which helped sooth our anxiety; her efficiency and prompt responses which helped get the job done. Special thanks to the banquet staff and IT tech on the

title: Thank you, Kenneth!
desc: Wonderful hotel with a trained staff. Enjoyed our stay and the river view from the room. Great swimming pool. Find the breakfast a little bit expensive. Rooms are comfortable, spacious. Close to everything.

title: Amazing experience
desc: An amazing experience overall.Services were excellent and Staff was friendly. Thanks to Shirley for arranging early check-in. The rooms are well maintained as well and are comfortable. Indian food is available.

title: A Wedding Dream Team
desc: Having our wedding at GCW Grand ballroom was an unforgettable and ideal one. Scrumptious eight course was prepared and served to our guests inclusive of canape during cocktail. Received many great reviews from our guests that we would like to echo and pass it along as thanks to the GCW team for the awesome experience. We would like to specially thank the following people: Serene, our wedding events specialist, was very experienced and patiently guided us to plan our dream wedding. She provided strong follow up on our queries and had many great suggestions while being deeply involved throughout this journey. Also, some smaller but much appreciated services such as having a separate room for makeup preparations for our VIP and having special food arrangements. Loreto, our

title: Amazing experience for short family trip
desc: i had the quick trip with my family in Singapore for December month. we got 2 rooms for 4 of us. The room is good and clean. i was welcomed by Vicent who is kind man at heart that i have ever known. His hospitality services is impressive. He helped me on finding taxi & getting direction for all convenience items and places that i like to visit He pays dedicated attention for his customers, i would love to visit the place again next year after the experience in the Grand copthorn waterfront!!!

title: A five star hotel, not! Family holiday from hell
desc: We booked the Grand because it was advertised as a five star hotel, we specifically requested interconnecting rooms as I’m travelling with my wife and four children. Firstly they did not account for this, and then it started from there. Firstly there was faecal matter in the carpet. The rooms are extremely poorly maintained and I attempted many times to resolve with staff, however they are extremely unfriendly. I ended up writing an email to the owner and then I got an amazing response we were relocated. If anything I rate the breakfast is amazing. Copthorne, you need to do better.

title: Wedding Stay
desc: Great stay for our wedding night! Helpful staff that ensured our stay was a fuss-free one! Both the staff Serene and Shirley expedited our check-in and ensured that we are able to check-in to our rooms on time (including or brothers and sisters' room).

title: Awesome stay!
desc: Very good experience! We redeemed this stay which was included as part our wedding package. We were allowed to check in early and were upgraded. The guest experience manager Shirley phoned and arrived shortly after with an anniversary cake for us :) She saw that we had a baby with us so she returned a short while later with a plush toy and a balloon! These actions made us feel super welcomed and valued! The room was very clean, neat, and very well-furnished. Only good things to say about the suite!

title: New Favourite
desc: Picked the hotel due to location Wonderful stay as everything is super new. Love the fact that the new room is so modern and stylish. Luxury feel and room view is so stunning overlooking Singapore Eye. Fresh linens and very clean room! Lunch buffet is good. Service is good. Door person friendly and helpful. Definite an A*! I will return and this hotel is recommended.

title: Overall good experience
desc: The rooms are clean and spacious. The pool is on 6th floor, so you won't get a rooftop experience. The bar server was very nice and allowed us to sit at the bar to plug in our laptops. The front desk provided electricity adapters for us upon request. Overall, great service. ~ a 10 minute walk to the nearest metro station.

title: A place for Wedding , A place of Hospitality
desc: We had our wedding held at GCW, we are very pleased by their services from the start to the end, from the planning to the actual day of execution. Special thanks to Joni , She has been patience with all of our request and do her best to accommodate to our request. She's very friendly and knowledgeable about the wedding procedure, whenever we have uncertainty she is able to advise us. During the wedding ceremony, Banquet manager - Bonn also showed excellences services during our wedding and always looking out for us (the couple) , family and friends. Even after the wedding ceremony has ended , the team (Kenneth and Joni) they also ensure that our stay with them is comfortable. Their services has exceed our expectations for sure. We are glad to engage to their services for our

title: Impressive
desc: Decided to have a stay-cation with my wife. Impressive newly renovated room. Everything is so new. Smells new too :)! Room is clean, spacious and very thoughtful. Forgot to bring my mobile charger and surprise… there is a wireless charging at bedside table. Very good feature to have this. Filtered water station in the room too. I have not stayed in Singapore hotel with this. Maybe there are but this is good. Bed is comfy. Sofa is huge. Menu for room service on TV screen and there is a QR code for ordering. Huge bathtub and shower stall with Christian Lacroix bath gel, shampoo, conditioner and also hand wash. So luxurious. Lobby well decorated with Xmas ambience. Easy 5 minutes walk to Great World City to shop and many eateries there. Also new MRT station Havelock is open!

title: A vacation made extraordinary
desc: The hotel has incredible customer service. Everyone was friendly, food was awesome in their restaurant, and the location of the hotel is perfect for getting anywhere in Singapore. The advantages of the Club Rooms are definitely worth the extra cost. Every evening at 6pm we were able to get selected drinks and appetizers at the downstairs bar. The hotel is right on the river, so walking/jogging paths are right outside the hotel doors. The walls inside the hotel are insulated enough that your room is a haven without hearing noises from neighboring guests.
