A big shout out to Kumar at the Tempo Bar and Ruffa who takes guest services and friendliness to a level not often seen in most high end hotels.

title: Best Hotel in Singapore
desc: Fantastic stay! I am so thankful of the staff that makes me everything possible and kept my room till my late check in time. Fast free check in. Friendly staff, Navin, that walked me to elevator and gave me all the information that i needed. The newly renovated room is a plus after such a tiring day! Spacious clean room. Well designed room with hi tech functions. Wow! Love the wireless charging. And thank you for the nice treats. I had a good bath too! Buffet spread is very good and yummy too. Worth every penny to unwind myself. Appreciate all the attention given. Tips: book for premier room on the new renovated floors with good view.

title: Bramd New Room!
desc: Super Good! Last minute booked this hotel. Wonderful experience. Reception was friendly, Claudia. Very professional and have so much patience. Room is soooo big and bed is super comfy. The concierge can keep your bags till you check out. Everyone so helpful and nice. Love love love this hotel. And yes! They serve great lunch. Sally (hopefully right name) is very attentive. Thank you Grand Copthorne Waterfront!

title: star rating of hotel
desc: The lobby was nice but when we entered the level, it was a disappointment. The corridor was very old and carpet was dirty, the room was old, and the TV even older. Was shocked to see an old model TV in a 5 star hotel in Singapore. Hoped to see an improvement soon

title: Dream come true wedding at Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel
desc: We had our wedding at GCW and am really happy and impressed with the personable service, beautiful ballroom (Riverfront Ballroom) and attention to details. When we first arrived for check-in, we were whisked straight into our bridal suite for a seamless checkin. Thereafter, banquet manager Bonn took great care of our tea ceremony, Holy Matrimony and banquet dinner. The coordination between the various hotel teams was excellent and everything ran smoothly. The decor in the ballroom was breathtaking and the food received many many wonderful reviews from our family, friends and colleagues. Kudos to the chef and entire kitchen and serving teams! The next day, we were invited to have cocktails and canapés which we truly enjoyed after a busy wedding day. At checkout, we were again

title: Staycation and Christmas celebration with friends
desc: My first time to stay with friends to celebrate early christmas at Grand Copthorne Waterfront. The hotel is accessible to mrt station and malls. Both the room and the toilet are spacious and clean. I would like to thank the customer service for attending our needs special mention to Mr. Anil Singh, Shirly and the guy who helped us to open our wine( coz the cork is broken..opps sorry forgot to take his name) the staff is friendly too. We enjoy the view from our room and the facilities like swimming pool and jacuzzi. The breakfast nook is spacious the food selection is great too. Definitely will recommend to family and friends.

title: Christmas Staycation
desc: A very good experienced here at Grand Copthorne Hotel. The food is fresh and the toilet is clean..Very relaxing to stay. I also enjoyed the swimming pool coz its clean..I would like to Thank You for excellent service from two staff Mr. Anil Singh who assist us for what we need. To Shirly for her very warming approaching. It's really recommended hotel.

title: Great experience at Copthorne Waterfront
desc: Great service and nice room at a great price. Serves great buffet. Staff are friendly and approachable. Sally introduce us to the buffet line and brief us the offers that are available at the hotel. Thanks for the hospitality. We will come again.

title: 3-5 mins walk to havelock MRT & great world city …
desc: Not first time staying at Grand Copthorne waterfront Hotel. We Book again for another 2 nights just for family staycation after last year Dec! We back again just to relax and spend time shop around town area for Xmas season! Just that hotel having some renovation n upgrading going on and we are unable to get higher floor n better view ! Near Havelock MRT! Near orchard Ion mall & Takashimaya Mall just 2 MRT Station away! Came Breakfast are nice ! We enjoy very much ! Very friendly staff & fast check in!

title: TERRIBLE SERVICE AND ROOMS
desc: This is the worst hotel i have stayed in, in my life. And i have stayed in 5 star hotels from london - dubai- maldives- australia. I am a frequent flyer and am forever flying. The service is poor, the staff are rude, if you are not wearing designer ( which in this day and age means 0) the staff are rude and will ignore you. Room service is not 24/h the cleaning facilities are poor and everything is forever closed! DO NOT STAY HERE! Good luck if you do, if you are from the west and are used to premium service and lifestyle stay away from this hotel, Its a shambles! Kindest regards Dr Judge.

title: Wedding lunch at Grand Copthorne
desc: No regrets holding a lunch wedding banquet at Grand Copthorne. Though there were quite a few change in wedding coordinators, Joni managed to take over the assignment smoothly. The food portions were generous and the food had exceeded expectations, better than food tasting which was already amazing. Service was superb and they went the extra mile during the banquet.

title: Anil Singh
desc: You know there is lots of hotel who would make you feel special until you check in and after that you are on your own but Mr Anil Singh was great help at this hotel . You have any issues go down there he will make sure that you get what you need

title: hotel stay
desc: We have been staying at your property since early 2008 and always return. I am not a member, but my husband Don Cocking is. We enjoy the view from the club room and the facilities. Now the MRT is over the road everything is easy to access

title: Wonderful stay with my family during my wedding
desc: Thank you Jennifer and Serene for making my stay in GCW a wonderful one! Even though we booked 7 additional rooms for my family, both Jennifer and Serene served us professionally. They were very patient in ensuring that every one of us checked in smoothly, while maintaining a nice smile throughout.

title: There will be no next time as they need to lift their game!
desc: Our room was pre booked for 7 days....however on arrival we found that the hotel was undergoing refurbishment. Unfortunately our room was located near the works area. We were advised of this in writing from the hotel manager, in a memorandum on the side table in our room. The work, we were informed would go from 9am until 6pm.....wrong! On the first day they were still going at 10pm. On informing reception that the work was still happening, the response was "Sorry for the inconvenience!" The day manager was informed of the noise and disruption. We were not offered a room change as the hotel was, we were told 'Full'....The noise continued for the rest of our stay! ...and I mean noise! Jackhammering, power tools, banging and yelling out from the trades people. Our stay was not

title: NOT a Five Star hotel at all!!! [NOT Recommended]
desc: This review is based on expecting a 5 Star Hotel as clearly and proudly stated on their website, but not getting this level of quality or service. This hotel is certainly Not 5 Star!!! 2 Star, maybe 3 Star. Our stay was not terrible, but when you pay for and expect a 5 Star Hotel, you should get one! Overall, the staff was quite defensive and not very friendly. Check-in The clerk was defensive. He told us that there will be renovations on some floors during the day and when we said the hotel should inform people before they booked, he told us we can stay at another hotel if we like (this was at 1:30 am). Asked about eating options, he said restaurants were closed but we can order room service. Got to the room, no room service menu, asked the bellboy for a menu, but never

title: Amazing Hotel and Room
desc: I loved the Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel! First visit to Singapore and won't be my last. I'll be sure to stay here again Outstanding service and staff. The 24/7 gym was so convenient and the breakfast was delicious.

title: Good location and catering to international travellers however due to renovation rooms and corridors stink.
desc: Good location and catering to international travellers however due to renovation rooms and stink. Found only 2 staff people I dealt with helpful and customer centric mindset, not sure if it’s a race thing. Otherwise stay was pleasant and location was great.

title: Best Birthday Dinner
desc: Celebrated my dad’s birthday at Food Capital! Everything was delicious especially laksa! Chef Gary was so kind to prepare a special birthday cake for my dad. Thank you. Hotel ambience is beautifully decorated. Staff in lobby and driveway were kind and pleasant. There was a live band playing on stage that makes the whole experience complete. Took a stroll down the river banks at night. Its peaceful and beautiful scenery. Overall - a wonderful time at Grand Copthorne Waterfront.

title: feels at home
desc: i stayed at Grand Copthorne Waterfront for 5 nights. feels at home. the hotel staff was very welcoming. paul concierge always help me to book a taxi in the morning. breakfast was the most enjoyable. thanks to steven,alvin and diana. for sure i will come back again. value for money

title: Great Hospitality and wonderful stay.
desc: Went to Grand Copthorne during the holiday and thank you especially to Sherlyn and Verone for ensuring us having a wonderful time. We were beyond thrilled when we were upgraded to residence suites (La Residenza) which was immensely fun and super spacious. It was a very good experience indeed especially with how big the suites were and how comfy and very private the suites are. The shower was a big + point too, especially with the cold weather and the water was very easy to control not too hot nor too cold. The bathtub was big enough for us. The living area and the bedroom is definitely what we love the most as it was very comfortable and quiet as well. Due to the rainy season we couldn’t use the balcony but still i had a wonderful stay! Thank you for providing me and my wife a

title: Great service and food
desc: The variety of food options at the restaurant has greatly expanded in recent years, offering something for every taste and preference. The service, as always, great with friendly and attentive staff. The restaurant always goes above and beyond to ensure that every customer is satisfied and has a great dining experience. The atmosphere is also pleasant, with a cozy and inviting ambiance. 👍

title: Recently renovated hotel
desc: Nice hotel in a good location. Recently renovated rooms. Executive suite had a nice view from 28th floor, including singapore river and marina bay sands hotel. Lounge was temporarily moved to the downstairs restaurant, but that was probably an upgrade due to outside seating options and restaurant tapases as food option. The one thing I would change was that the jazuzzi wasn’t heated.

title: Comfortable visit with exceptional breakfast buffet!
desc: Good clean comfortable rooms with large bathrooms that are overall very spacious. We slept well in the beds here after a long journey. Nice residential view from floor length windows. Pool area is very small and only suitable for a quick dip. No drinks service at the pool on the day we stayed. Excellent location on the riverside with a nice walk along Roberstons Quay and up to Clark Quay. We enjoyed walking by the river and even saw a family of otters. Breakfast the next morning was exceptional. We were surprised by the huge selection and presentation. Good service. Would recommend for a short stay. We didn’t eat at the hotel but walked across the nearest bridge to a restaurant called Limoncello which was very good.

title: Disappointed
desc: Location, food, restaurants good but rooms not refurbished were very bad - mold and outdated and dirty. Staff in general were very good in the food service departments but the front desk staff when dealing with unhappy customers were not as good.

title: Concierge staff is the assest
desc: What a memorable experience at the Grand copthorne waterfront Singapore. No other hotel can beat Grand copthorne breakfast, Very enjoyable. The room very clean and spacious. Marina bay view was spectacular. The concierge team was very accommodating and always their to help. Thank you for your service Paul,Bas,Dharma. Highly appreciated

title: Great hotel and staff
desc: We booked executive club. Unfortunately t is being renovated BUT we were very well looked after. Jennifer, the club manager was very professional and friendly nothing was too much trouble. The bar manager, Win, also was very helpful. All the staff were great. There is a new MRT across the road so on 2 stops to Orchard road and the same line takes you to Gardens by the Bay (Marina Bay)

title: Food Capital 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
desc: Food capital staffs are awesome! The service is great and the variety of food offered deserves 5 stars! The international buffet covers Chinese, Japanese, Indonesian, Indian, Western and also some local delights!

title: Singapore experience
desc: Good experience, rooms were tidy, staff are friendly, Vincent one of front staff was exceptionally customer oriented, went out of his way to ensure to ensure our transport is organized. He took care of the luggage as well. Overall great experience

title: Food Capital CNY buffet
desc: Large variety of delectable buffet dinner options. White wine recommendation is light on the palate , suitable for spring dining. This evening they had a guitar duo come in and live singing. Overall relaxing dining experience.

title: Best Stay Ever!!
desc: Best Sunday!! Totally enjoyed our stay at this hotel. It was worth every dollar. Smooth and quick check-in done by the most accomodating front office staff. Able to get room with great view and it’s newly renovated!! Sparkly clean with modern minimalist interior. The bed is soo comfy, had a hard time leaving the bed. Had a great Sunday lunch at their restaurant, great ambience accompanied with great music. There was a duo piece entertaining us that afternoon. Kudos to all the service staff and management for making our stay enjoyable. We had the best time and definitely will return for a second stay in the near future. Highly recommended!!

title: Spacious rooms with excellent service
desc: Checked in to their newly upgraded room and I must say it is worth the money. Room is spacious and very clean. Shirley and the front desk gentleman were most hospitable and helpful. Hotel is near mrt and great world city so a great place to stay.

title: Wonderful Hotel
desc: Had a wonderful time in this hotel. Overall I am confident to recommend to everyone who wants to stay in Singapore hotel. Staff at front desk, concierge and restaurant were very efficient and friendly. The room that we stayed is new. View is awesome as you can see Singapore city and sunset. We received a welcome note and very creative macarons and chocolates. Thank you. My daughter went to the pool on 6th floor while my husband did some work out at the gym. We had nice time walking along the river at night and love the ambience. Always love having breakfast in the hotel. The chefs were friendly and smiley. That makes our breakfast even better. Kudos to the management team. During my stay I can see managers around the hotel lobby and restaurant areas and always so helpful to

title: Honeymoon
desc: We stayed in the beautiful Grand Copthorne waterfront for 3 nights, shirley all the staff were super friendly and accommodating!! Breakfast was beautiful, they left a beautiful cake and balloons with a card for our anniversary ❤️

title: A hotel worth staying
desc: We are staying in the residence suite periodically during and after covid as my wife and I love to have our staycation there. The hotel feels like a second home to us as all the staffs are very friendly, warm, caring and they attend to all our needs. Staffs like Shirley, Kenneth, Steven and Paul just to name a few, are the people who always makes you feel welcome at any time of the day.

title: Wedding Anniversary @ Food Capital
desc: Awesome food and value of money. Great service from the team and made my dining experience wonderful..ambience is relax and will definitely return to this fantastic restaurant again. See you guys again real soon.

title: Perfect Stay
desc: Great Stay in Singapore. Concierge service always welcoming and polite.. Nice clean, comfortable environment. A wonderful hotel beautifully decorated for Christmas. Location is accessible. Would be my first choice when I’m back in Singapore.:)

title: Had a great experience at Food Capital buffet!
desc: Thank you Vinisha, Chef Keong and Service Manager Ibrahim for making our dining experience such a great one!! The sashimi and oyster was fresh and the steak was good as well! Good value upon booking from eatigo as well :)

title: My Best Experience
desc: Professional staff, room and everywhere are well upkeep and price are good. I will not hessite to recommend any of my oversea friends to stay in this hotel whenever they are in town. It will be even better if you could provide buses through and for from all Singapore sightseeing and place of interest.

title: Staycation family
desc: Room is ok staff is friendly(Nizam) and helpful. Clear instruction. Location is ok. Carpark abit of run down and quite dark. Otherwise overall stay is satisfaction with my family. Spend quality with family

title: Vincent took amazing care of us!!
desc: Vincent was amazing in assisting us with our taxis when we had to call one. He was so lovely and kind to us, which we appreciated so much. It made our stay so lovely, we can’t wait to come back next time😊

title: Fabulous Staff
desc: We stayed at Grand copthorne waterfront Singapore for 4nigths. The room was stunning. The bed and pillow very comfortable. The breakfast was the best. Reception and Concierge was very friendly and accommodating. Especially claudia and Paul. For sure we will come back again next year. Highly recommend. Best Rate at all

title: Need’s attention!!
desc: Full refurbishment needed . More hotel and attractions information in the bed room Fridge that works properly Ensure room is clean and free from previous residents Hairs which is disgusting to find . Bathroom needs upgrading with a moveable shower head

title: Good stopover
desc: Stayed one night on the way to Australia. Staff all very helpful, check in great. The room was fine maybe could do with a bit of decoration but was very clean and had everything we needed. Breakfast good. Got taxis for us. Good location with the water front at the back with nice outlook

title: Best upgrade
desc: Second visit here and was attended by the beautiful and friendly Ruffa. The other staff here is friendly and approachable as well. Also Ruffa upgraded my room to the newly renovated room. It’s 💯💯💯 Will definitely come here again

title: Club Room
desc: Great stay on Executive floor in refurbished room which was excellent. The Executive Club was not open as just about to complete the upgrade. A little inconvenience but the ladies (Ruffa, Doris and Selena) looked after us very well and a credit to the hotel. Thanks again

title: A good place to stay, worth recommending!
desc: Checked into room 2312 and 2314 on 25 Feb 2023 for one night stay. Front Desk Ruffa at check in is worth commending, she is helpful, cheerful and service with smiles. Rooms are top notch condition, spotlessly clean, cosy admist contemporary interior design. It has latest modern state of art fixtures, fast speed wireless connection ,has a wireless charging device on bedside night table for mobile users. The bed is comfortable, it has on its box divan base the night light to keep the room lit when all lights are turn off. It is worth the stay and recommdending

title: Gloating in past Glory
desc: Have stayed at-least 8 times during last 10 years at this hotel. Previous memories have been good and enjoyable. Present one: terrible ! Why ? let me go step by step and then you decide. 1. They has a promotion "Experimental Package" where a guest could choose between 5 options : (a) early check in at 11 am (subject to availability) (b) late check out at 4 pm (subject to availability) (c) two glasses of champagne at their bar (d) 30 Sing Dollar Credit for Food and Beverage We had an early arrival into Changi so we chose this package. To be on a safer side, I sent an email to the hotel, being previous guests and millenium members requesting for early check. Had a delayed non-committal response. Still we took a chance. On arrival in Singapore I called the hotel, they said they

title: Save your money and DON'T stay there!
desc: It is not very often I get so annoyed that I have to resort to telling others about my experience. This hotel has changed dramatically over the past few years. I am a club member and have been an avid supporter of this hotel...."Well not any more!" The staff appear generally unhappy and it show in the work practices. On checking in at the hotel for an 8 day stay, I handed over my passport and credit card, as I do in the majority of international hotels I stay at. I was informed that my credit card was not required. I noticed that there had been staff cutbacks Checked into our room...noticing peeling wall paper and dirty marks on the walls. There were only two sachets of coffee (Most hotels allow 6) Later we discovered mould on and around the shower tiling...Not impressed as

title: Super
desc: We stayed here at the end of February. The only criticism is the noise of the lift we were on the 30th floor. Room good size and clean. In the room there was a water tap to refill your own drinking bottle to take out and about. Plus to drink in your room. We arrived at 9am check in was not until 3pm....to our surprise they found us room and was allowed us to check in. Excellent service. Breakfast was excellent so much choice. Unfortunately on the 3rd morning I slipped in the restaurant knocking my knee up. The staff were so attentive. They even called our room later in the evening to check if I was ok. Also the next morning they came to speak to me to check if I was ok. Bar staff were so polite and well mannered. Drinks expensive. Would we stay here again...yes we

title: "Girls trip Singapore"
desc: I have recently returned from a fabulous holiday in Singapore, where I and 3 friends stayed at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel. First impressions of the hotel was good, with a welcome from the concierge who whisked our luggage from the taxi and delivered it promptly to our room. Reception was friendly and super efficient, after a 12 hour flight we were tired and appreciated a smooth and effortless check in. Our room was a good size, clean but a little dated and lacked some furnishings eg only one comfy chair, a really tiny wardrobe, no vanity mirror in the bathroom for us ladies and a little mean with the complimentary teas and coffees. A big plus was the huge windows with a great view. Zuba our excellent room attendant kept our room spick and span. The hotel is

title: Only Hotel to Pick if staying in Singapore. A home away from home
desc: My wife and I stayed at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel in Singapore we can not recommend this hotel to you more highly. Situated on the river with great views and short walks to Cafes and bars. Also the staff there were magnificent. Nothing was a bother and our sincere thanks go out to Shirley who made the stay a memorable one. If you are going to Singapore this I’d the Hotel to make your home while you are there. Colin and Kim Archer

title: Nice place to stay
desc: We stayed here on the last stop of a month long trip. The hotel is very nice. Service was very good. Locaion was great. It is a bit away from the marina area, which was still very accessable, but is in a very relaxing area. Situated along the river walk there ae many dining opportuniies close by, from 5 star to the Zion food center, which I prefer.

title: Great stay
desc: Lovely staff Great hotel, value for money. Large rooms, great breakfast. Staff were very friendly even though we arrived late at night, They even allowed us to stow our luggage the day we returned from a cruise

title: Very mixed but not 5 star
desc: So we stayed 3 nights at the end of a six week tour and this was going to be the luxury bit. We checked in very late and were”upgraded “to a delux room on floor 24 trouble was this floor is directly under the renovation works making the room unusable during the day . We complained and were told it was our travel agents fault! Room was nice enough and hotel facilities ok , nice pool , ok breakfast . Real lack of lounge space which is important when you can’t be in your room! Staff were very hit and miss , reception good , concierge great , restaurant staff rude at times always abrupt ,house keeping staff great. As a 5 stars guest I do not expect to be told sharply to go and change my shoes for breakfast as slippers not allowed! Don’t supply them if you don’t want guests to wear

title: Amazing experience. Love it!!
desc: Shirley at front office made the whole experience so wonderful that i loved my stay. I had a complimentary upgrade to a super spacious and beautiful room. The toilets were huge and amazing. The checkin was swift and so pleasant and sweet by Shirley. Love her. Thank u for the amazing stay!

title: Beautiful, luxurious, relaxing hotel close to everything you need in Singapore.
desc: Stayed here for 2 nights on a stopover. Fabulous hotel in every way. staff couldn’t do enough for us. The place is spotlessly clean and well cared for constantly. Pool facility a nice extra. Straight onto riverside walk heading down town. Only room for improvement is that when passengers arrive from overnight flights and are unable to check in, a complimentary drink could be offered when they register and leave bags and consideration to call you as soon as your room is available. .

title: MR. ANIL SINGH
desc: Had an amazing stay, I enjoy my time here at the hotel staff is very friendly and helpful, Particularly Mr. Anil Singh who check me in and provide me the eight room on time. Thank you staff for the wonderful experience.

title: Excellent
desc: We have travelled all over the world but the Grand Copthorne has the best breakfast with so much choice. The location on the river front is perfect with so many great restaurants & it's good value for money & we would certainly stay again. Beds are really comfortable as well

title: Perfect for our short, stay in Singapore
desc: We stayed at this hotel for three nights. On our way to Langkawi. It was an ideal location, very comfortable, great food and very accommodating staff. I would like to mention, particularly Kenneth who helped us booking in, late checkout and choosing our room. He showed us around the hotel to the pool, the room and the gymnasium and we found that he went above and beyond our expectation.

title: "Old" hotel feels but very good location and service
desc: The hotel has this "old" look and smell, furnitures like beside tables etc should be upgraded, especially for the toilet with nonexistent bidet but Overall experience was good, location was perfect and service was extremely excellent, especially from Shirley, I never got a friendly experience ever before from anyone else compared to Shirley was !

title: Stay in Singapore
desc: The stay at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront hotel during our 5 night stay in February was a great disappointment. When we checked in, we were given a room on the 7th floor and were told that it is quieter on the 7th floor as there are renovations taking place on the upper floors. The room and the bathroom were very small. The water was not draining in the wash basin and we had to call twice to get it fixed. All the power outlets in the room were loose. We had dinner at the hotel a couple of nights. One night, by the time I got my food, my friend had already finished hers. The only thing that was up to our expectations was the spread at breakfast.

title: Best service!
desc: Sally Ho and team provided amazing service during our family dinner, made us feel like VIPs. The food was pretty amazing too! Definitely coming back for more and will recommend to friends and family.

title: CNY dinner at Food Capital
desc: My extended family came twice for dinner during this CNY period. As the overall food experience was good, our group of 15+ pax came back again for the second meal. At this place, I enjoyed almost every dish including the bbq prawn / sotong / satay, sushi, crackers, and types of chilli. I also appreciate the range of hot drinks available for self service. Today, one of the staff (Sally) saw that some of us were eating with our hands, and she supplied us with wet wipe with the packaging open. This was a proactive action that we appreciated.

title: outstanding service
desc: We came to Singapore for 4 nights. and stayed at Grand Copthorne. we enjoyed our view in the room and the breakfast very satisfying. the front desk veron and concierge staff Paul,Ravi,Basiron is awesome kudos 👏 for sure we will come back again.

title: Great service - thank you Vincent!
desc: Very pleased with the service and accomodation here. Great location too. Vincent at the front was very helpful with getting us cabs at really affordable rates and very courteous. Would stay here again.

title: Pleasant stay with brilliant view
desc: Ideal location Lovely rooms Front of house staff were good. We’re not able to take breakfast items to room. Superior room was spacious but a little noisy with guests departing and arriving . On the whole a pleasant stay

title: Attended a conference
desc: Really nice hotel and gave me a fresh perspective of GCW as preciously I came here a few years ago and it was quite old. I really liked the food for lunch and the buffet was very wide in selection and quality was very high. I liked the proximity to good restaurants along Robertson Quay as well. Would definitely come here again.

title: Dayuse
desc: Shirley was the manager and she upgraded me to a club room - she’s extremely lovely and is an asset to the hotel. The rooms are also extremely comfortable and worth the visit - will come back in the future for both staycations as well as holidays.

title: Do Not stay!!!!
desc: Hotel is in bad nick and needs a lot of work. It might have been "Grand" 20 years ago. Not anymore. Electrical sockets were loose, loud banging sounds from the pipes throughout the night. Went down to reception to complain as no action was taken when we complained over the phone. We thought it was from the renovation work that was being carried out. The night manager visited our room and acknowledged that there was a loud sound, but felt that it came from the pipes. To her credit, she did offer to change our rooms, which we declined as we were checking out the following day and it was midnight already. We accepted her offer of earplugs and a late checkout at 12PM. We get a phone call at 11:45 asking why we hadn't checked out. We did checkout at 12 itself. We didn't overstay.

title: Grandfather birthday
desc: Went to Food Capital to celebrate my grandfather birthday, the buffet had so many choices to choose from and service was amazing. I would like to thank Mr Ibrahim and the team for giving complimentary cake and memorable experience Definitely would come back again.

title: Outdated room with sewage smell in room
desc: Outdated room with sewage smell in room. Otherwise, the hotel is adequate for its level of star rating. Location is good. Polite staffs. Good gym facility. Outdated swimming pool facilities. Insufficient front desk staffs to service guests during high demand period.

title: Would recommend
desc: Great hotel and location. Would recommend upgrade to club. Shirley Jennifer & Ruffer extremly helpful On the negative bar service extremly poor, inconsistent bar service across our stay. Waterfront rooms excellent veiw

title: Excellent and will return
desc: I stayed in a renovated room, which was excellent. I enjoyed it very much and very likely that I will return. The price is a bit high but taking into account that everything went up so much in Singapore, it's still a good bargain.

title: All the services were perfect, staff is very customer friendly and are always present on front foot at their best.
desc: All the services were perfect, staff is very customer friendly and are always present on front foot at their best. Ambience is also very nice and also like appreciate for the breakfast they had provided.

title: Love the Renovated rooms
desc: Had a amazing and pleasant stay at the new renovated rooms. It was modern n chic design with gorgeous bathtub! The room has modern touches n apple to mirror iphone n android phone. N has wireless charging too! Amazing stay will def come back Ms shirley from the front desk was very accomdating n welcoming

title: Excellent staff and service
desc: Hotel currently under a bit of a refurb but with little disruption. Much needed as Covid has not been good for anyone. Small issues easily and effectively resolved nothing being too much trouble. Key staff always helpful Navin and Ruffa worth a special mention and than you

title: Dedicated and helpful staff, new room decoration to come
desc: Staff at reception is efficient either for check-in/ check out operations or simple inquiries. I booked a deluxe and the room superficy was important compared to what is usually found in Singapore. Plenty of spaces in cupboard. Bath tube and big shower. Beds are incredibly comfortable. R My room is not along the newly renovated and although very well maintained, it is dated. Redecorating is in process and already available. Breakfast is delicious, with plenty of choices

title: System must be updated or sync accordingly.
desc: I felt disturbing by the front desk phone line and staff that keep asking me to check out. Perhaps the system error the previous guest was checkout and I check in after that. I book under the day use apps. After I check in to the hotel, the staffs keep ask me to check out even though I already explained to them I just check in and was under day use from 8am to 8pm. But yet I still receive an email reminder and call from front desk to ask me check out.

title: Excellence Service and Good Food
desc: Went for the Iftar Ramadan. It was nice ambience to dine in for Iftar. The food spread was good and worth. I would like to compliment the service team for their excellence service. They are always there to assist. Great job to all. Jessy, Christian and Alfian as well to the chefs.

title: Wilton Family saty March 2023
desc: The hotel is excellent. The staff are all friendly and willing to help in anyway that they can. The hotel is suituated on the river and is close to a number of pubs and resteraunts. I would recommend the hotel to anyone travelling to Singapore.

title: Room for dayuse wasn't as expected.
desc: Room for dayuse wasn't as expected. Pics in booking site misleaded me to think that the room will be more spacious and double bedded. However, it came twin bedded and really small. Decor felt old too, with cracked toilet walls. Although functions were not affected. Room service did not arrive at all. But overall stay wass still ok. Staffs were welcoming at the counters. However, tele operational staffs wasn't as friendly and helpful on meeting requests.

title: EXCELLENT HOTEL AND STAFF
desc: Cannot praise the staff enough. However would like to mention two staff who were exceptional First of all Ravi who was kind enough to sort a problem out regarding our pick up time from Virgin to take us to the airport on our departure also arranging for us to have a place to stay after vacating our room because of a late flight.He was really helpful The other member of staff was Vincent who was on the door dealing with transport and luggage etc He was very helpful and mentioned places of interest Thank you both We love the hotel and staff so much we have already planned to return in November

title: Great Experience
desc: Wonderful experience ... The concierge is also helpful - tks to Vincent (concierge). Love the location... Rooms gym and food all very nice... Have stayed many times here... Staff is also very hospitable 👍

title: Great Staff
desc: The staff at the property was very welcoming and friendly. The property is slightly old but undergoing renovation. My room was very spacious and clean. The breakfast is a do not miss, it has a wide variety of options in both food and beverage.

title: Fantastic location with Cold hospitality
desc: Without a doubt, one of the best locations to stay in Singapore! Upon arrival, we had a very cold welcome by the staff. At the reception, Mr Ismail was the one who helped us with the check-in. A very rude & unwelcoming personality, i.e., Ismail did nothing for a fast check-in. A lady who really helped us with a quick check-in was really a gem of a lady. She could feel the tiredness that we were facing with the kids. She was swift enough & got us rooms alloted within a quick span of time. Also did she offered us a comfortable lounge area where we could spend our time while our rooms were being done up. Despite being newly reconstructed, the rooms were just ok. A complete makeover is urgently required with the carpets. The place is heavily used due to its central location.

title: Excellent value business hotel in attractive location
desc: price quality relationship is excellent, and I like the location in a fairly quite but still central location on the river. The renovation noise is not a problem, except that clearly sometimes work continues outside the hours communicated.

title: Great experience
desc: Great service at concierge by Shirley, very clean room with great amenities. Free upgrade and cake on birthday. Very good food as well. Unfortunately, buffet only open on weekends. 10/10 would come here again.

title: Wedding banquet at GWC
desc: I had just hosted my wedding banquet at Grand Corpthone waterfront (GWC) in March 2023. I had my concerns initially before deciding to proceed with the banquet at GWC earlier in the year. However, I was surprised and impressed by the overall service provided by the hotel. My sales director Joni had been wonderful to work with, she has ensured that we were able to proceed with our event within 3 months from when we decided to proceed with the banquet. The short time frame was due to some booking issues with another hotel. Everything went really smoothly from food tasting, checking in, all the administrative stuff including the banquet itself. This would not have been possible without the help of Joni and her team. Alif has been very helpful with my AV matters, assisting us

title: Short Stay
desc: Stayed here on a two day stop over whilst on route to Australia. Hotel situated on the edge of the river and the pathways provide excellent access in to the city. Staff were excellent and the room clean and spacious. Although breakfast had a set start time due to our early flight we were allowed to enter and have breakfast before we left. Food is excellent with so much choice giving you an insight in to the local cuisine.

title: Good place to stay
desc: Comfy bed, great shower, lovely view from 11th Floor. We had a few meals at Tempo, great service from Wan Son, so nice and friendly and totally on the ball. Good position for MRT station just over the road. Everyone was very helpful. Great buffet breakfast although found the dinner buffet expensive. Swimming pool good, also a fully equipped gym but did not use that!

title: Dayuse Room
desc: Totally enjoyed my dayuse here!am served by Shirley and Was given a free upgrade! I was informed upon check in that the hotel was under some upgrading work ongoing so there will be some drilling sound etc..but the sound isn't so bad or super loud, plus there is a notice in room to inform guests about it too..very thoughtful. The room is really nice and clean . Room service is super delicious and price was really reasonable too! Thank you Shirley and front officer manager siew mei and all the hotel team for making the stay comfortable..was definitely be back again for staycation instead of dayuse!

title: Great Location and Service
desc: The Hotel is clean and located on the waterfront. walking from the lake where you can stroll time and also close to the train station. Staff is very friendly and nice with good breakfast. Hence making an overall experience a good one.

title: Great Customer Service
desc: I had the opportunity to stay at the Grand Copthorne during my recent visit to Singapore. Great place to stay with best food options. One of the aspects that impressed me most was the customer Service at front Desk. Anil Singh, who assisted me was extremely professional and personable at the same time. Professionals like Anil make a positive difference in hospitality business.

title: Great holiday !!
desc: This hotel never fails to impress. The location on the river is perfect for walking without the hustle bustle of the city. The staff are friendly and polite and the restaurant serves food for all tastes from around the world.

title: New Rooms and Exceptional Service
desc: My family and I had a treat staying in the newly refurbished rooms on Level 29. What left us wanting more, though, was the lovely service we received from the staff. Foremost, huge thanks to Kenneth for listening to our feedback from our last visit and taking them so seriously, we actually saw the changes materialised in the new rooms. You made us feel valued as guests. We love your detailed room tours - they helped us decide which room type suited the family best. Thanks for staying past work hours to accommodate our schedule. You certainly went above and beyond your duties. Throughout our stay, you were caring and meticulous in looking out for our needs and for that, we are truly grateful. It was lovely meeting Ruffa on this visit! Your warm greetings whenever we met

title: Thanks for the experience
desc: Thank you for a wonderful experience. The hotel is currently going through some modifications on the inside so expect some noise during certain hours of the day. Perhaps a little on the pricey end of the spectrum in terms of some of the older/outdated rooms which haven't been renovated yet. The staff were polite and kind. They also dealt with an issue we experienced during our stay very professionally and actually upgraded us for free. Thank you for this. Bas and Vincent were also very helpful during our stay. They're kind gestures and interactions made our stay that much better. Great interpersonal skills. Thank you.

title: Trip
desc: Very good, some rooms need work look tired and drab ,but overall was very satisfied. The location was great staff were extremely friendly and efficient. The ambience of the hotel really good.Overall a very pleasant experience.

title: Lounge
desc: We had a 2 night stay in the hotel the service has been first class we stayed in a club room which give us access to the executive club lounge which is on the 29 floor the views are amazing also the food and drinks are so nice and the service is first class a special mention to Francis/Kenneth who looked after us so well Also Shirley the manager could not do enough for us letting us keep our room till 6pm Because we had a late flight home thank you again can’t wait to come back Steve Baldwin

title: Thanks greetings
desc: March 5 2023, i was so excited to check in Hotel Grand Copthorne Waterfront to Celebrate my 40th Birthday with my friends. And finally when i was open the door there was a ballons on top of the bed and it says that " happy birthday". I am so happy in that moment. I never expect that from Shirley .It makes my birthday bright and happy. And then i open the toilet door and i really like it because it clean and smell good. Later on i recieved a call from staff and it was a male voice from Anil and he great us a warm welcome, he even sess that "we enjoy ourself staying and relax. He even taught us the instruction for what we need just encase we need help. This kind of service was really fantastic and the staff really well good. It comes from their heart sincerely. I am a traveler

title: Awesome
desc: I would like to say thank you to mr.anil and ms.shirly for assisting us when we celebrated my friends birthday at the hotel...room is clean and cozy and we did enjoy staying their for a day...looking forward to see the two of you again

title: Great wedding experience!
desc: Just held my wedding at the hotel. Tbh, the experience exceed our expectations. The Sales Manager was super approachable, and was re-assuring in the addressing our concerns. The Guest Experience Team was also extremely knowledgeable and make sure that our needs were met during our stay. The operation team was also re-assuring in ensuring that our events went ahead according to our plans. Overall, it was definitely a great experience: If you are looking to hold an event or have a great stay, look no further than Grand Copthorne Waterfront.

title: Not really 5 star, but it is being refurbished.
desc: Hotel was let down somewhat by the condition of the yet to be refurbished rooms. Lighting was dim and the room was showing its age. Otherwise, the hotel was fine - food, staff. Book a refurbished room if you can.

title: Summary of stay in one sentence - staff are lazy and slipshod.
desc: Summary of stay in one sentence - staff are lazy and slipshod. In short - the room was unsaleable until I insisted that the problem was fixed. Refer to the following sequence of events. 1830hrs 16 Mar 2023: Left my room to go for dinner. Personally spoke to same receptionist (Foaunia) who checked me in. Reported a fault with airconditioning system. 3 hours since checking in and absolutely no cooling at all. Told her that the room would be vacant for the next 3 hours. To please to repair the fault when I am out. 2120hrs 16 Mar 2023: Returned to room. Problem still not fixed. Called 0 and spoke angrily to Gayathri. She had no record of my report about the aircon fault. I said that I had reported it at 1830hrs to same receptionist

title: DAYUSE
desc: Daycation experienced was great! :) room was amazing newly renovated service staff was excellent. a slight issue on the beddings which is already feedback. i hope they look into it. definitely coming back again!

title: Great experience and definitely recommend
desc: I spent a night at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront after my wedding at the Red House Seafood restaurant there and I was extremely delighted by the attentiveness and care that the hotel staff had provided to my wife and I. The room was very spacious and the bed, and shower was very comfortable too. I'd like to thank the manager Shirley Chng for tending to us and looking after us so well throughout. The breakfast buffet was a sumptuous spread as well, and we got to access the Executive Club Lounge as part of our bridal package, which was a lovely respite on the 29th floor. I'd recommend the Grand Copthorne Waterfront anytime.

title: Excellent service delivery
desc: Great service by Shirley. Greeted by her warm smile. The room is newly renovated. The executive lounge design appeals to the relaxed mind. It's a comfortable stayca for the family and convenient location to vivo city.

title: Not the room that we booked
desc: Booked bigger room for a night staycation but was given a newly renovated smaller room. Bathroom was a bathtub type. We don't really use bathtub. Preferred a normal bathrooms type for shower. Hope our next visit will have the room that we booked. Thank you.

title: Great stay
desc: Had a smooth check in thanks to Mr Navin Seh for making the whole experience fast and smooth for me. From room 2103, thanks to the whole team. Wish I stayed longer. Clean room and looks new and tidy. Toilet was clean. Overall satisfied with staff and hotel service

title: Memorable moment
desc: I give 4 stars…Very accomodating staff.. convenient in everything🚖🧁🍰🍭🍪im always having a good sleep in a relaxing room and breakfast is so….❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ can recommend this place for couple, solo traveler, family travel and business..👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

title: 3 star at a PUSH
desc: Supposed to be a 4 star hotel but it really isn't. Don't get me wrong, the service and staff are good and friendly but the place is tired and dated and our room is filthy. LOTS OF dust, especially at the back of the bed, mould, a damp wall, badly painted. I like to write REAL reviews so I've attached pictures to prove this . The breakfast was OK but all the food was luke warm if that. I wouldn't stay here again.

title: Food Cqptial lunch buffet
desc: Very nice buffet spread, nice staff around the restaurant m, lots of delicacies, pasta, local Asian, Japanese fresh cut, Indian nann, rojak, bingsu.... Awesome atmosphere, will be back very soon. So many good to try, the cakes are awesome and not too sweet

title: A Stellar Staycation!
desc: A smooth checkin in we were assisted by Shirley and Paul. The room that was allocated for us is the river view front was breathtaking, pristine and spacious room. Friendly and attentive staff at Club lounge - Ruffa, Kenneth and Doris. Thank you for your hospitality. A stellar experience to remember. Thank you also to Anil and SiewMei for on point service during check out. Look at the photos something you can refer to staying at this hotel.

title: Try it and see.
desc: When booking, the larger rooms are so much better. For the little extra needed for the Deluxe 32 sqm rooms, worth every extra sent. The river view or city view rooms are excellent. Very relaxing. All of the staff are respectful and caring. Down stairs bar area and river sitting, quiet and beautiful and good live music. Great world City Mall and MRT (TRAIN) a 5 minute walk and has all your conveniences. River walk up to Clarke Quay and beyond is fantastic. Many restaurants along the river walk. Yes, in the past this hotel has had its ups and downs-midlife hotel crises. It seems it has improved a lot since some of their renovation improvements. Good on them. Give them a chance or the opportunity to redeem.

title: Nice room, very nice and sweet of the front desk lady
desc: Nice service, warm welcome, very helpful and very informative of Ms. Verone who assist me on checking in the room. She gives me a very nice room, right after the lift so my mom does not need to walk so far, and it’s city view. I cant ask for more… i love it!!! All the best to Grand Copthorne and all the best to Ms. Verone :)

title: Nice hotel in quiet but convenient area.
desc: Nice hotel very close to trains and buses that will get you anywhere quick. Probably my favorite part was Vincent at bell desk/concierge who went above and beyond to help with getting us where we needed to go and helped with excellent info to get around the city. Breakfast buffet was good as well.

title: Great Stay
desc: Vincent the frontman was very welcoming and amazingly helpful. Should be more professional people like Vincent around. Thanks for a great stay we will be back. Great Service from all Copthorne staff. Room was nicely made out and inviting.

Starting, the concierge team were friendly, greeted happily. Reception, register was fast even the room was not ready when we reach. Understand on their check in time 1500hrs. A big thanks to Shirley the Club manager for arranging a delicious birthday cake for my son and superb room assignment. Appreciate it so much, we love the room and the view. Thank you to the Level 29, Club staff for assisting me with the luggage to our room 2916. Everything is just a thumbs up, especially the bell team.. i am sure to come back again... see you Millennium team..

title: Amazing housekeeping
desc: 27th floor Housekeeper Wang Chen was very helpful. Chefs in the hotel's breakfast buffet are very attentive. However, buffet needs improvement in their system of claiming tables. Tables that I was eating on (I already placed "#yolo I'm still eating" token) are always taken by other diners or cleared by the staff. Diners have no idea how the systems works. In my opinion, it isn't sufficient to just give the token without explaination. I always have to relocate tables or look for new utensils.

title: Great for business and family luxury stay
desc: Great hotel for both business and family staying in luxury. Great rooms, great service, great waterfront setting. Breakfast was outstanding - Wow what a selection. Dinner outside on the waterfront is just a sight to behold

title: Another excellent experience in Singapore.
desc: An excellent hotel to stay and relax in. Great value for money. Lovely, smart, friendly staff. Food excellent , too. Thank you. Would definitely stay here again when visiting Singapore. Great location on the Singapore River. Super views.

title: Pleasant weekend stay
desc: Thank you for the great stay and attentive service from the club staff Kenneth and Francis. Kudos to Kenneth for making us customised cocktail, its refreshing. Thank you to the housekeeping team for the clean room and the front office for giving us the room upgrade, really appreciate it.

title: General experience is ok. Room 1820 TV set is malfunction. Breakfast SGD28 is too expensive and not value for money base
desc: Room 1820 TV set is malfunction. Breakfast SGD28 is too expensive. Not value for money base on food offer. The location is too far 30mins versus the location need to visit. ASMPT 535 technology park A.

title: The hotel Room
desc: The bed is comfy. Location of the hotel is convenient and easy to access to shopping mall. Easy access to parking area from the hotel room to the car park. Good security in the hotel room. Overall the hotel room is good.

title: Lovely waitress at Grand Copthorne Hotel in Singapore
desc: I would like to compliment Kathisah at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront hotel. Kathisah was our waitress who looked after us every morning. She was so helpful and friendly, a credit to the hotel. She gave us ideas on where to go and how to get there. I will miss her when I go home.

title: Very nice experience
desc: It was a very nice exoperience staying at Grand Copyholder Waterfront Hotel. I had a room with a magnificent view, the service was good. Next time in Singapore I'll choose this hotel again and I'll recommend also to my friends.

title: Lovely staff
desc: Stayed for two days in late May. Great hotel where we always stay in Singapore. Next to the river for walks, a small food market and shopping mall. Look out for the very charming Vincent on the concierge team. Thanks to the young male receptionist who did a great job in organizing a late check out for us and getting us a taxi - great service! Graham and Hazel Wellington New Zealand

title: QUAITHIAM
desc: very bad room internet connection on 27.04.2023, 28.04.2023 , complained and without improvement cannot use TEAMs, because internet broken and no more connections. small ants in the rooms because of sweets

title: Thanks to Shirley and Anil
desc: Very nice, polite and professional staff. Great service 5 star .. cheers . Special thanks to Shirley and Anil for their all help on short notice changes. Cleanliness and variety of breakfast options makes you feel great and give you energy to start your day with full of enthusiasm to explore Singapore☺️

title: Relaxing staycation
desc: Had a relaxed staycation at Grand Copthorne Waterfront during our birthday month. Comfy, spacious and well-appointed room and awesome services from the friendly staff. Verone and Syaakir were patient and provided prompt response to all our queries. Shirley was kind enough to surprise us with a complimentary bottle of red wine knowing that it was our birthday month. The club team (Kenneth, Doris, Jennifer and Francis) were attentive and helpful whenever we popped by the Executive Lounge for drinks and food. Highly recommended for a relaxing time off busy stressful schedules!

title: Excellent service
desc: Have some hip out as agoda website show superior room with bath tub but was told there is no bathtub and my son is disappointed but the guest experience manager Shirley Chng upgrade us to a new renovated room with bathtub. I would like to compliments her with a excellent good service that make my stay happy here .. thank you Shirley!

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Stayed here with daughter son in law teenagers got early check in and late check out , Francis Shirley Doris and Kenneth were wonderful .food fabulous room spacious , executive club lovely staff go out if they’re way to please everyone

title: Amazing Hotel and staff
desc: We have stayed at this hotel for the last three days with family including 2 teenagers. It's been amazing! The staff are incredible and cannot do enough to make your stay perfect. The food is amazing. The location is fab, with great views of the city. I will be sad to leave tomorrow. If we are ever in Singapore, we will definitely return to this hotel. The lady that checked us in was called Shirley and nothing was too much trouble. We ate in the Club lounge every evening, the staff in there walere exceptional, Especially Francis and Kenneth.

title: Exception staff and service
desc: A wonderful stay. The staff were amazing and did everything possible to ensure we were well looked after. Great location with easy access to restaurants, transportation and a local supermarket. Highly recommend.

title: Poor conditions in Ladies Changing Room to Swimming Pool
desc: The Reception and Breakfast areas were lovely. I know the hotel is in the process of upgrading rooms, but our room 1120 was particularly dark with sepia coloured net curtains. The bed was lovely and comfortable and the shower-room adequate, though the drain in the shower gurgled when using the sink! The ladies changing rooms for the swimming pool needs some work. The louvres in the doors to the changing rooms were full of fluff and dust. Only one of the 3 showers was usable; one had no lighting, one had no temperature control handle on the shower and the other one was ok though the whole room needed cleaning. Very disappointing for a high class hotel in Singapore.

title: Great Excellent Service
desc: It was a very last minute 1 night staycation with my son after we having fun at east coast park. I checked in the hotel at around 7.30pm. Ms Shirley Chng, hotel Guest Manager served me on the check-in registration. She was very friendly. I was supposed to check out the next morning at 11am, but when I requested Ms Shirley that I would like to extend my check out time at 2pm instead by paying extra, and immediately Ms Shirley told me that I can check out at 2pm without any extra charges as I had checked in the hotel in the evening time, and also she had me checked in to a newly renovated room instead. I was so glad and satisfied with her warm welcome and services. My son is very happy when he entered the hotel room, especially whenever when he want hotel staycation room to have a

title: Mr. Srikanth
desc: Excellent interiors in overall hotel and inside the room. All renovated room with big screen TV, wireless charger, big rooms etc., Mr. Vincent warm welcome and Hospitability makes us feel good. He helps us during check-out, helping hand to shift my luggage. Highly comfortable hotel for Business or tourist visit.

title: Fantastic stay using club class facilities
desc: Fantastic visit in the club class facility in this hotel. Recently redecorated part of the hotel and access to the club lounge made this a very memorable stay. The initial reviews had me worried but my experience was totally different. The club class staff were amazing. Particular thanks to Kenneth, Jennifer, Doris and Francis who were all brilliant!

title: My trip to Singarpore
desc: My stay in this hotel was amazing. The staff were wonderful and very kind. Francis, Navin, Radzi, Syaakir, Doris, Ruffa ,Halim Joe ,Shirley ,Kenneth and of course Jennifer. These were the guys who at the Hotel they couldn’t do enough for me. Gagan Singh the General manager was so good to us as my parents were with and they are in their 80s Gagan Singh over and beyond to provide the care that they needed. I highly recommend this hotel

title: Food Capital - Buffet dinner
desc: Went to Food Capital for their buffet dinner - Seafood Literature to celebrate a birthday Wide spread of choices of various cruisine. Great service and friendly and attentive staff! Used plates are cleared promptly.

title: A pleasant haven in a great location.
desc: Thanks to all the staff who have been polite and professional throughout our five day break here in Singapore. A special shout out to all the team at the Executive Club who went the extra mile headed by Shirley. Major refurbishment works being carried out with no disruption to guests. Our newly refurbished room on floor 28 was immaculate.

title: Great service
desc: Shirley the guest experience manager is super warm and welcoming, great service, enjoy our stay there! Checking in is a smooth process. With bathtub, v nice! My family and i also enjoy the strolling at the paths surrounding!

title: Comfortable stay
desc: Very convenient location with nice view from Singapore river. Many restaurants and pubs along rever side. MRT just next to hotel which conveniently connect many attractions with single ride. Bigger room with sufficient space to open two traveling bags with any issue. Clean room and it was newly renovated. Excellent assistance of staff. No security deposit when checking in. No bottle water provided but water filter available in the room. Water taste is very good and no issue encounter with it. Hotel provided shower facility if flight on late night on check out day and it is very helpful.

title: Amazing experience
desc: The hotel is stunning. We had the Club Lounge, the food and service are amazing, The large buffet breakfast is superb. Big shout out to Jennifer, Wan, Brian, and Vincent, they all provided impeccable service, were friendly and helpful. We would definitely go back.

title: What an experience..!!!
desc: Our experience for Singapore would not have been the same had it not been for our stay at the grand copthorne hotel. All the staff was so polite and accommodating, specially Francis and Shirley who were so helpful to our requests. Our two year daughter got a little stuff toy gift from Shirley and these small gestures were what that made our stay there extra special. The gym was so good and trainers in the gym like Gregory and two others were so informative. It was a delight working out there. Breakfast buffet was amazing. Indian chef (who’s name I am forgetting) was so helpful to provide help for our daughter when she was not in a mood to eat anything else. We not only want to recommend the place for our friends and family who’ll visit Singapore but also we ourselves want to

title: Good
desc: Very happy with Vincent in the hotel. Very helpful and good guy:) Helped with our luggage and information. Hotel was fine, only problem the standard checkout time is at 11am. Room was a bit humid too.

title: Excellent Experience
desc: The best Hotel in Singapore… i always stay here whenever in Singapore (more less 20 years) the service is always excellent… the staffs are the friendliest… the room is clean and comfy… ^^ always happy to stay here

title: Great Hotel in lovely location
desc: We really enjoyed our stay at your hotel. I must mention SHIRLEY on Reception who booked us in. Her enthusiasm and personality made the experience welcoming And enjoyable. The whole process was seamless and she upgraded us to a refurbished room which was really nice, especially the view of the river. We also had breakfast each morning which was delicious with plenty of choice. Our party also enjoyed a buffet dinner on our second night. The choice and quality of the food was delicious. Really impressive. Many thanks for a memorable stay. Mrs C and party

title: Nice renovated hotel
desc: Hotel was renovated, and good location, easily accessible to many places downtown and business districts. Hotel room was refurbished, with good amenities, Staffs quite attentive and polite. I felt safe and confident that our room is clean and disinfect. Buffet breakfast was great variety of choices and food was delicious. Makes my stay memorable with good experience. Will definitely come back to stay at Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel of Singapore.

title: Thanks Vincent!
desc: Nice hotel! Exceptional service from Vincent, thanks for a great trip. Recently renovated and well located hotel. Staff were also helpful. Enjoyed my time here for a work trip first time to singapore

title: Nice property
desc: Excellent property. Great location and excellent service staff. A word of mention for Mr Vincent who was extremely hospitable and friendly. Enjoyed thoroughly . The food was very good as was the service team.

title: Amazing short visit
desc: The staff were so lovely with their accommodation and helped me and my family find a place to stay very short notice when our flight was cancelled. They were so amazing and were very generous with a very reasonable price. On top of all that, the food was beautifully cooked and excellent service in the restaurants. Amazing staff and lovely location.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: A wonderful stay. Beautiful room with fantastic views of the river and back to the city, Great location with fabulous amenities. I would would like to give a five star thank you to Francis, Kenneth and Shirley in the Executive Lounge. Their friendly smiles and kind demeanour made us feel very welcome and cared for. I will miss our daily conversation with Franics, he was always showed an interest in what we had done and seen. I would also like to mention Cherry and Jeff at the Food Capital restaurant, both were very helpful and friendly. I look forward to returning next year.

title: Weekend Hotel Stay
desc: Newly renovated room is good, however there's slight 'smell' from the new furnishings and carpentry. The corridor outside newly renovated room has new carpet and look nice, however i felt the corridor lighting was dim (subject to individual preference).

title: One of the best hotels in singapore
desc: Excellent service and delicious breakfast. I loved staying here with my family and they had a fantastic service for any facility which we asked for throughout our 3 night stay. The stay has been a wonderful experience.

title: Value and nice surroundings
desc: Not many hotels have a green surrounding and a nice river and amenities like tennis court. Many pubs and cafes just around the corner . Now added plus point is that there is a subway for one to move around cheaply. Only setback is that the hotel is not link to the station with a shelter.

title: Short trip
desc: Good stay in this hotel ! Gotten a new room with a nice view on a high floor. Thank you Shirley for being so helpful always. For the questions and concern we have during our stay. Always greet us when we enter the lounge and offer us drink. Have a short conversation with us before she continues her works. Always have a smiling face even through she have a long day! You are a gem in this hotel !

title: Nice location
desc: The hotel is located near a train station for convenience. You can get to the main tourist attractions using the train. Although the bathrooms are small, the rooms are average size. The in room dining selections is very limited. The staff is friendly. The hotel is very clean. There are many restaurant choices in the river walk right behind the hotel.

title: Great Place to Stay when in Singapore
desc: Our first time in Grand Copthorne Waterfront Singapore, the Hotel newly renovated. We stayed for 3 nights and my family enjoyed it so much. The room is clean, the view is nice and bed is comfy too, it even have your own in room water dispenser so all you need is a water bottle so you don't have to buy bottled water as it is a bit pricey when you buy it at the convinience store. But what me and my daughter enjoyed was the breakfast buffet, there are a lot of food choices everyday. Also staffs are very friendly and nice, especially Cherry Morales (we really appreciate your hospitality) of the reception area of Food Capital during breakfast, she really made sure that we are comfortable and enjoying our breakfast and stay in their hotel. Thank you so much, we would definitely go

title: Thank you
desc: Xiao Li and Jian Ge is so kind.I almost lost my umbrella and cloth but they found it very fast.I can go home with my things.Thank you SO much!! Also,the room is awesome,too.I had amazing experience in here.

title: Very Good for 3 nights
desc: I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights. The room I got looked recently renovated which was nice. Loved the hardwood floor instead of carpet. The room and bed sheet were clean however the sheet and pillows had a weird smell like the were washed but not properly and fully dried which caused unpleasant smell into them. Only missing things I noticed in the bathroom is hair conditioner and body location. Breakfast was had a good variety between western, Asian and Indian dishes. I wish them has Middle East option as well. The concierge guy Deneal was very helpful in answering and clarifying any questions you might have regarding a place and best way to get there. He will give best recommendations and help you in booking taxi if needed. He can also help you buy online tickets to save you

title: Singapore 🇸🇬 stay .
desc: It"s one of the best hotels that I have stayed in. Extremely clean very comfortable room and staff who are very friendly and will go the extra mile to always make you welcome and help you in any possible way. In addition to been located quite centrally. Thanks. I enjoyed my stay here and look forward to staying in thus hotel again.

title: Fantastic end to Overseas trip
desc: The king room on the 22nd Floor had exceptional views and could not be faulted . The staff and service were both excellent. The property is within easy walking distance of restaurants and shopping centres along the river. The SMRT rail is about 100 meters across the road. All in all it was a fantastic finish to our South African trip.

title: Great daycaytion with great hospitality from Shirley
desc: We an amazing staycation! Everything was exceptional. Shirley from the front desk team deserves special recognition for her outstanding customer service. She truly goes above and beyond. I believe Shirley should be considered for management training due to her exemplary and genuine approach to serving guests. Room was clean and great. Thank you Shirley! We’ll definitely come back!

title: hotel stay
desc: We have been using the Grand Copthorne Waterfront for over 15 years and keep coming back. Vincent was there to greet us and attend to our luggage. Also during our stay was happy to help with any needs we had on how to get to our destination or anything else we needed.

title: A pleasant stay
desc: Grand Copthorne Waterfront is a lower-tier 5 star hotel, definitely not high top tier hotel like Ritz Carlton, and not mid-tier like Carlton city, but comparable to Carlton Hotel (city hall), so do adjust your expectations to the right tier. For the price point perspective, where it ranges from the 300ish price point, pretty similar to comparable hotels like Carlton hotel (City Hall). What stands out of this hotel is that their rooms are relatively new as they had just completed their renovations works, so this is a plus. The walkway have a more refreshing wooden warm tone which make you feel welcome when you walk down to your room, and their room number sign have some sort illuminating lights, which make it more premium looking and easier for guest to find their room.

title: Our Singapore trip
desc: We have been frequenting this hotel for a number of years, and we keep coming back. We find the location suitable and now the MRT is nearby helps. The staff are friendly and provide much assistance in a professional and caring manner. We book a club room as it gives us access to the executive lounge which is excellent value for money Kenneth and Francis were outstanding hosts in the lounge and nothing was too much trouble for them to assist and they provided some helpful advice that assisted us in Singapore

title: Good location to experience Singapore.
desc: I could enjoy Singapore river anytime(even late night) thanks to the location. Great World shopping mall and the subway station was walkable distance. Breakfast was good, night time was quite, and it was a good stay.

title: Clos to Train 🚉 Havlock Station to everywhere in Singapore. Pool, Jacuzzi. Comfy beds..great water pressure and shampoo Body w
desc: Balan and Vincent were so professional and fun coordinating our Taxis and helping us with our 🧳 on arrival. Helped with directions and options to take the trains and buses. All the staff were fantastic..pool jacuzzi were really clean. Towels fresh and beautifully folded at entrance to pool. Bathrobes and slippers provided in our room. Cleaning staff to our room offered extra towels and were really professional..

title: Great time at Grand Copthorne Waterfront
desc: The staff were excellent and very attentive and helpful directing us to Bugis Mall / Market and the surrounding areas! Ravi was particularly helpful going above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of and able to shower before our flight out!! Food was excellent from Tempo - had the 3 sliders: hand cut chops with truffle and parmagianno and the deep fried California rolls which were also amazing! The seafood pasta was also delicious and I would highly recommend that! Thank you once again for a very special stay albeit very short 🙏🙏🙏👏👏👏👏 Singapore 🇸🇬

title: Great for Business and Social
desc: Grand Copthorne Waterfront is an excellent property located near the central business district but nestled within a green and relaxing environment that is by the riverside. It was home to my principals for months and they never got tired of the hotel and staff!

title: Vincent
desc: Fabulous hotel though lacking storage in the room. Beautiful pool, sha.e rhe bar wasnt open Would like to mention Vincent who was really attentive ans sorted out our taxi to rhe airport at a great deal

title: Excellent stay
desc: I stayed at the hotel for one week. Room was very comfortable and clean, great shower! Breakfast really good, with many options. Very amicable and attentious personnel, especially the front door assistants Bas, Dharma and Vincent, who always were there to help our needs.

title: Pleasant hotel experience!
desc: An excellent hotel to stay and relax in. Its at a great location beside the MRT, which makes going to the main attractions in Singapore convenient. Had a great reception experience by Verone. Thanks for making our hotel stay a great experience!

title: Back on track
desc: Vintcent was very service minded The hotel is back on 5- star level. They have lots of upgrades lately. The rooms and the gym looks nice. Location close to beautiful Robertson Quay and Clark quay. Recommended

title: Day Room at Grand Copthorne Waterfront
desc: I booked a day room and the room was comfortable , I loved the wooden flooring. The TV left a lot to be desired as the channels were very few and I battled to join their wifi as a Millenium member so I could airplay! The staff were wonderful and very efficient especially Dharma who went the extra mile to assist. The Lunch was good in the restaurant and my only complaint would be that it was not very quiet so sleep was not easily possible as you could hear people going and coming from their rooms. Perhaps they should have day roomers in a seperate section where most people want to sleep and then go and use the hotel facilties. I did due the pool but it was disappointing as it was contactless order by Barcode which does my head in. I would far prefer a service when I am

title: Great value for money
desc: This was our second stay at the Grand Copthorne Waterfront (the last time was in 2017), again in a large Club room. The recent refurbishment has done wonders for the room, being comfortable, modern, spacious, and with all amenities. I especially liked the large television with ability to screen mirror from my tablet, perfect for those rare earlier nights in! Even though the Executive Club room was closed for refurbishment we still had our evening drinks and tapas in the Tempo bar, and the staff were brilliant, special mention to Francis and Stella (I think?) for looking after our food and drink needs perfectly! The breakfast buffet is great, and caters for various cuisine preferences. As far as 5 star hotels go this one is certainly more towards the lower end of the star rating

title: Singapore Tour
desc: Singapore Tour. We had experienced all 5star facilities and recommended to stay . To add more Eleganz into my Singapore tour.. it was value added . I enjoyed each n every moment of my stay in this hotel.

title: Another great stay at Grand Copthorne, Great and helpful staff
desc: Pleasant stay at Grand Copthorne. Vincent the doorman was very helpful with our many bags and calling cars. Great attitude also. They are currently renovating but the noise is not disruptive since the work is usually done when we weren't around. Also fantastic location with the Havelock MRT station right across the street.

title: Good staff
desc: The duty manager Nizam was super helpful and friendly. One of the nicest service staff i have encountered. The room was in good condition and is newly renovated. Woll definitely consider making another trip back!

title: 2 NIGHT STOP OVER
desc: OVERALL SERVICE WAS VERY GOOD. DHARMA THE DOOR MAN WENT OUT OF HIS WAY TO BE OF SERVICE. ROOM VERY TIDY ALTHOUGH STORAGE SPACE LACKING. FOOD AND BEVERIDGE PRICES ON THE HIGH SIDE. GOOD LOCATION WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE TO MRT & SHOPPING MALL.

title: Singapore experirince
desc: Great Location, rooms are clean and the staff friendly and ready to assist. Easy to move around either with taxi or mtr system. Nice place also to walk along the channel/river up to Marina Bay. If you do not want to eat in the hotel there are many places along the river

title: Still smiling face
desc: This is my second stay in Grand Copthorne, the room was well renovated, Surprisingly, Bas still working in the hotel with the same smiling face, helpful, and good knowledge in interesting place in Singapore. First met him was 2017 when I celebrated my anniversary with my husband. There is a newly MRT station right in front of the hotel. Well recommended hotel.

title: Excellent stay and service
desc: We had a room at the 16th floor with views towards the riverfront . The staff was excellent, especially the young gentleman Joe. He’s always cheerful, polite, very helpful and assisted us during our stay. Overall experience very satisfying, incl beds, bathroom, breakfast and the fact that the hotel is very quiet despite its central location. Perhaps nothing really stands out though, given the price point.

title: Reception Staff need to take SYAAKIKs lead in service
desc: Food is incredible. Some of the reception staff are amazing, but not all. Some are outright rude. The amazing reception member I would like to mention is SYAAKIK. I have had to change rooms three times due to noise and finally this gentlemen has put me in a room that is not near the hammering and chiiping that is going on. Why was it so hard?
