One of the reception staff even said to put earplus in we can't help you. SYAAKIK came to the rescue for not just me but three of my colleagues who had the same issue.

title: Magdalen
desc: Excellent hotel and services. Very friendly staff, Mr. Anotl (sorry for any spelling error), Denea and Balan. Always ready to help. Breakfast was good overall. Location was a bit of a distance from my conference location but the MRT made it easy to access!

title: A great place to stay
desc: We have enjoyed a memorable stay at the Hotel, the room was very clean and had all amenities required. The hotel is well situated and near a rail station and bus line, there is a close shopping mall and several food markets. A highlight for us was the friendly and cheerful staff, at the front were Dharma, Mathan and Ravi who always smiled and went out of their way to help. We will certainly be back

title: One day stay
desc: Stayed in the hotel for a day and the room we were given was impressive. Checked in and out by Mr Nizam and his service was genuine and he went to the extra mile to ensure our stay was a comfortable one. Food from the bar was good too. Overall, recommended and will be back for another stay.

title: Great facilities , and location. and extremely comfort able. .
desc: Staying 9 days at this property, and extremely impressed by the location and more so the amenities. A big shoutout to incredible concierge staff, who were extremely knowledgeable and friendly. A very special Thankyou to a wonderful and efficient restaurant colleague, Khadijah, who greeted us with a smile each morning. Thankyou.

title: Disappointing Grand Copthorne.
desc: We stayed here for three nights and that was plenty. The rooms were quite nice but that was about it. The reception staff were arrogant and bordered on rude. The fridge was not working so we ordered some ice and were advised it would be 10 minutes and took 90 minutes. Very busy for breakfast where another couple decided to join our table so we were forced to move and the breakfast was of a poor quality. Very disappointing for the price we paid. We will not be back.

title: Great stay!
desc: We stayed as part of a family vacation where we were greeted by Saleem who was extremely kind and helpful. The rooms and facilities were modern and very clean. Francis, Kenneth and Khatijah were very thoughtful and accommodating going out of their way to make our stay enjoyable. Would deffo recommend!

title: Fast and efficient
desc: Had an email to do Easy check in..upon arrival staff was nice and gave me room a lil early than the check in time which was great. Got to my room, it is clean and big. Love the mbs view from the rm. Staff was quick to respond.

title: Great stay
desc: The whole experience was fantastic. Staff were brilliant. ., so helpful, nothing was to much trouble. Room was super clean and lots of space . My wife is a wheelchair user and it was so easy to get around. Fantastic!

title: Good stay at a newly refurbished hotel
desc: Stayed in a premium room, newly refurbished, so everything in the room is new and modern. Big improvement from my last stay a few years ago. Front desk service was good and brisk. The guest experience manager, Shirley, was very friendly and helped ensure a smooth check-in. Hotel provides free parking for guests. Breakfast had a good spread, again an improvement from our last stay. It's a pity there is no more outdoor sitting. It was slightly crowded, might be worth considering to stagger breakfast timings.

title: Relaxing Staycation
desc: Had a great staycation with my siblings at GCW (return visit). The newly furbished Premier Club room is spacious & bright, & the walk-in wardrobe cum dressing room offers privacy & good storage space for bags. Room is clean and the beds are comfortable. One feature we simply love is the Filtered Water dispenser! Great efforts in GoGreen movement! Being one with sensitive taste buds, we must say the water taste refreshing (slightly cool especially good in this hot weather) with no unpleasant taste. Please do sustain this with proper maintenance. There was abundance of power points and usb ports, and even a wireless charging spot on the bedside table. We just wish there are firmer pillows (personal preference). Water pressure is good and bathroom has both standing shower &

title: Awesome service
desc: I am a frequent visitor to Grand Copthorne and check in is always a breeze and Nizam’s service is impeccable. He’s always friendly, polite, willing to go the extra mile and really professional. He’s truly an asset to your team.

title: Amazing stay
desc: Staff went above and beyond to ensure we enjoyed our stay. Absolutely loved the newly renovated room, especially the filtered drinking tap! Such a great location and amazing value for money too! Highly recommend.

title: Vincent was great
desc: We met Vincent during our stay and he was so nice and couldn't do more for us. We got chatting whilst he was helping us with our bags to put then in storage. He also remembered us when we returned to collect our bags which was nice. Star employee!

title: Vincent
desc: Vincent assisted me excellent, always did his best to support me quickly and made sure i had everything i needed. Due to his assistance i was always in btime on my appointments and i never had to wait long.

title: Great location
desc: We loved our stay here. We had two recently renovated rooms. In one room we had our 16 year old sleeping on the daybed (which was fine and much better than a pull out couch). This room was huge compared to normal hotel rooms so there was more than enough space for 3 of us. The buffet breakfast was fantastic with many options to choose from.

title: Staycation
desc: Hotel is well kept and clean! Facilities may not be fully available as hotel is currently undergoing renovation and improvements. I tried the breakfast in the hotel and it was good with lots of food varieties. Hotel is also very near to the train station so it is easily accessible.

title: Great hotel stay, shoutout to Vincent
desc: Super great experience with our stay here at the hotel! We love the breakfast buffet spread! We would gladly come back just for the breakfast! :) The rooms are clean and well maintained. Big shoutout to the friendly staff, especially to Vincent. He is the best!! Very friendly, super helpful (he helped us with our luggages and my mom’s wheelchair) and makes us feel welcome! Thank you!!

title: Great stay
desc: Had a great stay. The hotel is located centrally and the room is very well appointed, love the water filter (no more plastic bottles!) I would like to make a special mention of Francis, Jennifer and Kenneth at the club lounge who were so friendly and helpful especially Francis who advised me on how to use the MRT and places to visit during my stay. The breakfast was great but can get very busy during the last hour or so but there is always plenty to eat. The gym was a good size and had everything I needed. The wifi was great too. Definitely recommend

title: 5 star accommodation @ Grand Copthorne Waterway
desc: Amazing stay and wonderful experience! The suite was newly renovated with a wonderful view of the River and the city. The amenities were great what with Nespresso maker which I loved most! The room was clean and nice interior. the suite size could accommodate a family of 4 I suppose as it was big indeed.

title: Fantastic Holidays
desc: This place could have got 5 out 5 ( want to give 4.5 actually ) but some issues which I will mention here . We moved to this Hotel from Paradox on Clark Quay . ( 3days ) First the negative part -- After that is all Positive . It seems the front desk was over worked and could see irritation on their face with so many check ins ( They should be happy that they are packed and have such good business ) . They spoke in a manner which annoyed us stating that check in was at 3.00 ( which we knew ) . We had just come in for a Luggage drop and were suppose to leave for our activities . The wait was good and when we were back we were able to get room we wanted . Water Front , newly renovated , luxury rooms . I have to say whatever it mentioned , it had all . The room was Newly

title: Overall service
desc: Excellent hotel. Good service. Very delicious food especially singapore tradition food. For Bakery is bread egg is excellent also. Place in front of Haverock station. It's so convenience to travel in Singapore

title: Relax n Worth coming
desc: impressed by restaurant food n service, especially staff at food capital like Sally ho,she is helpful, friendly,will recommend more friends n family to come.We love the dessert, especially durians.tks

title: Two day stop over.
desc: Pleasant hotel but improvements need to be made re breakfast arrangements. Staff were very helpful and hotel and room were very clean. Pool area was inviting but more shade is needed, no umbrellas around.

title: Nice hotel but poor service
desc: Pre-booked and paid for an additional night for early check in but was told that room was unavailable upon check in. Zero effort to accommodate my traveler nor following up on service recovery at any given time.

title: Thank you Jennifer and Francis !!
desc: Had a great experience at the club lounge. Jennifer can be seen to always going for extra mile and is very keen to serve you, always providing alternatives instead of a "no". Special mention to Francis for accomodating my request for to make a drink that wasn't in the menu. Service from him was good too ! Food choices tend to be a little limited especially the afternoon tea, loved the scones though. The duty manager's service on 2nd June afternoon at the check in counter could have been better though. Seems unkeen to serve also provided false information. I asked if we had access to the club lounge just to chill and have some drinks but he mentioned that I can only access during the timing where they provided the afternoon tea and evening cocktails. All in all, thanks to

title: Compliments to Staff
desc: Highest compliments to Kenneth for going above and beyond in so many ways - going through the various room configurations to recommend what’ll suit the family best and making reservations for us at short notice, taking into account our preferences down to the small details, and even notifying us when tea was ready early the first day or when there’ll be something special (like an NDP light show) to look out for at the Club Lounge. He’s observant and very considerate of our needs. Thank you, Kenneth, for your hard work and care towards us; you’re the first person we think of whenever we plot a staycation and an asset to GCW and the Club Lounge! In your presence, we feel assured and well cared for. Thanks also to Francis, for your tireless service at the lounge! You definitely

title: Food capital buffet dinner
desc: We’ve been coming back for our buffet fix quite regularly. Today’s spread is exceptional!! Everything we had was fantastic although I it would be perfect with chocolate ice-cream included in your dessert offering… the jazz band is a nice touch!

title: Grand Club Waterfront Room, Must Try!
desc: We booked a new Grand Club Waterfront room for my last night stay before heading back my hometown for a long break. We received a warm welcome from Jennifer and Francis when the lift door open at level 29. Impressed with their new room featured with their green initiatives efforts. Thanks to Francis and Jennifer who make our evening cocktails full with their loves! Especially cocktails that made by Francis, definitely will bring us back to GCW again! Thank you for GCW and well done on your refurbishment project! You deserved for the 5 stars rating!

title: Wonderful Experience
desc: The hotel is at great and convenient location that allow easy transportation to other locations in Singapore. The hotel is undergoing renovation but the sound is minimal and totally acceptable even when I’m working in the hotel room during day time. The breakfast offers a variety of choices in good quality. The lobby receptionist Vincent is being very helpful to help me load my lugguage and item on taxi when I’m heading towards the airport. Will choose this hotel again next time if I visit Singapore.

title: Overall good stay
desc: :) -The room size is good - The bathroom is also good and also the toiletries are provided - Veg options at the breakfast buffet - Good In-Room service - Location is also good near to the Station as well as Bus stop :( - The staff at the Reception could have been more cordial whilst check-in, considering I had my parents and two children no water was offered or we were not asked about our journey as well which is basic. - Same breakfast everyday no change

title: Vincent was very helpful
desc: Vincent was very helpful with advice about where to go to eat and shop as well as always willing to do anything to make our stay memorable. We will definitely be back and would gladly recommend the Copthorne Grand.

title: Excellent stay
desc: Nic3 helping staff, especially Vincent, very kind to help us with our luggage. We used this room, very spacious and grill food is good. Reception staff were very frieny. Location is good. Room is little smaller than expected but fit for purpose

title: Nice stay at Copthorne waterfront
desc: Stayed in the premier waterfront room with a free upgrade to exclusive club lounge privileges. The recently renovated room was modern, spacious and clean with a fantastic view of the Singapore skyline. I received amazing service from Shirley and Kenneth at the club lounge as well throughout my stay as well. A great variety of delicious food was offered at breakfast buffet and club lounge.

title: Excellent stay
desc: Overall the experience was excellent. Would like to mention Francis and Jennifer for their hospitality at the lounge. Room was clean, spacious and extremely comfortable. Have been to several hotels in Singapore for a quick getaway, and so far Grand Copthorne is one of the best ones!

title: Best view of Singapore
desc: Beautiful views, lovely drinks, good variety of breakfast food and Vincent was excellent and very helpful and polite. Having drinks by the water was very relaxing and easy to get around and beautiful walking tracks

title: Relaxing and comfortable stay but need to improve breakfast choice…
desc: Good service including reception, concierge and especially housekeeping from Huo Ji on 25th floor…meticulous. But find that breakfast choice was limiting and disappointing …no ala carte menu available except for buffet. Not befitting a 5 Star Hotel. Rooms renovated…find the filtered water, bidet in the toilet and cozy lightings at night very thoughtful and in line with current needs…especially the bidet and wash features. If not for the disappointment in breakfast choice, it would be a 5 star stay.

title: Great experience and personal touch!
desc: Finally utilised the bridal suite (grand executive suite) with GCWF after our wedding about 2 years ago. The experience was great with their newly renovated executive suite. The food provided for the dinner cocktail and hors d’oeuvre. Was served by Jennifer and Francis and they did their best by serving us and making us feel welcomed. There was a personal touch to their service. My wife and I will definitely be back for a staycation with our daughter. Thank you for the great experience GCWF (Millennium group)

title: Excellent stay in SG
desc: Thank you Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel for the very satisfactory experience. The room was fantastic -- spacious and clean! The food variety/options in the restaurant was also very good. The location and the view from the room was fantastic! Thank you for the awesome experience.

title: Great experience
desc: Amazing place, thanks to Vincent at the concierge desk for its help! See you all next time. We been very happy to stay at this hotel close to everything and taking cabs from this place to any other places in Singapore has been very helpful!

title: Just ideal for what we wanted
desc: With a 19 hour layover in Singapore after a 13 hour flight from London we needed a rest and this hotel was selected as a 'day hotel'. Great choice! Train from Changi took an hour and the walk from the station about five minutes. Book in was easy and room was ready. After an excellent shower we hit the bed to be greeted by possibly the best hotel pillows ever. Sleep was almost immediate and we woke up just in time to get ourselves ready and depart. A quick glance at the hotel did suggest it would be a good place to stay on normal occasions but, in our situation, it was perfect! We will certainly stay again when in Singapore.

title: Disappointing
desc: The hotel has a terrible paint and chemical smell in the rooms, deluxe rooms are very small. On complaining our rooms were changed , but still not satisfactory. I will not recommend this hotel to anyone.

title: Clean Rooms & Great Service
desc: Had a one night stay at the Grand Exec Suite. Newly renovated rooms were clean and up to expectation. There were food, drinks and pastries available at the executive lounge and we enjoyed the cocktails in the evening session. Commendations given to Francis and Jennifer who attended to us.

title: Not recommended at all.
desc: Highly unprofessional and non courteous staff. The rooms were terribly stinky and no resolution inspite of multiple complaints. Rude and arrogant staff and we haven't seen any senior guy around to ensure the smooth running of day to day operations. We stayed in this unbearable property for 4 days and somehow survived. God bless you all.

title: GCRF lovely.
desc: Great hospitality. Prompt services. Hygienic. Vincent @ concierge desk was extremely humble , polite & helpful. Keep it up GCRF. Thanks for good times. The swimming pool can be larger and with better facility. ✌️

title: Club Lounge excellent service
desc: We recently stayed at Grand Copthorne Hotel and enjoyed the Club Lounge. The friendly service provided by Jennifer, Shirley and Kenneth was first class and we thank them for their professionalism and courtesy. It is always a pleasure at this hotel.

title: Great service and location
desc: Best thing about the hotel is Vincent, he is super friendly and always helpful at doorman. Never let him go he is an asset to your hotel. Great hotel and efficient, highly recommended. Well located hotel with great selection for breakfast. K

title: Great stay
desc: Very good value for the money, we enjoyed our stay. The gym is excellent, the location is superb, one of the best thongs about the hotel. Staff was super friendly and took care of every of our needs. Security is good, always felt safe. Coming back for sure!

title: Good gym and clean
desc: Super clean hotel. Gym is really good. Breakfast wasn’t amazing and the coffee was ordinary. Dinner at the Bar and Grill was better than expected. The hotel ‘fragrance’ was horrific. So strong, just about knocks you out when you walk in the door. Vincent the bag handler was very attentive, warm and super friendly.

title: Relaxing business trip
desc: Excellent hotel situated in a very pleasant area with riverside walks and easy walking distance of Boat Quay where there’s a vibrant social scene with a multitude of restaurants and bars. Vincent on the door was particularly helpful when it came to arranging transport and also his local knowledge of interesting places to visit and enjoy Singapore.

title: Superb staff
desc: Everyone in the hotel was accomodating. From check-in to check-out, all the staff assisted us to make sure our stay was smooth. One bellman, Vincent, took really good care of us during our check out and transfer to the airport. A really good experience.

title: JIM AND ANNIE
desc: loved the hotel and location would recommend this for anyone coming to singapore plenty of small bars and restaurants nearby . underground train station very nearby easy to get to other places on the mrt. and very cheap

title: Always a Great Experience at Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel
desc: We’ve stayed in this hotel for several times and each stay has always been a great experience - clean, big and beautiful rooms with modern facilities (facilities were so much better after they renovated especially the initiative of installing sleek faucet for unlimited drinking water instead of providing bottles), awesome view, friendly staff (including Leo Guo who never fails to meticulously clean our room for us) and perfect location.

title: Need improvement
desc: Room cleanliness need to be improved. pillows very smelly and had sleepless nights. Room was not swept and moped properly, until we need to complain at the front desk. But the staff are very responsive and approachable.

title: Excellent Hotel with A+++ service.
desc: We were very pleased with the accommodation and facilities of the hotel. The staff were friendly but with special mention to Shirley, Jennifer and Kenneth from the Club Lounge, they had made our departure really stress free and easy. We will definitely be going back there. Highly recommended. A+++ service.

title: Grand Copthorn Waterfront
desc: Very easy and fast check in, however I did arrive a day late and did notice that some other guests had to wait for their room to be ready upon arrival. Room was clean and spacious. My bed did have a slightly strange smell at times unfortunately. Gym was small but had enough weights and machines to get a decent work out in. Lovely pool area. Easy walking distance to restaurants cafes etc and the MRT. Vincent helped me with my bags upon departure and ordering a taxy, he was very helpful.

title: Highly recommend this hotel
desc: Fabulous stay for a week in a newly renovated room with water views. We enjoyed the variety of the breakfast buffet each morning. Hotel close to Havelock station, which we used each day of our stay to see the sights of Singapore. Special thanks to Selina, Brian and KC in Tempo Bar and Grill for taking care of us whenever we visited.

title: Terrible Experience
desc: I stayed in the hotel in the month of july 2023 and had a terrible experience, as the service is very poor and takes a hour time to deliver any thing you order from kitchen or from house keeping. MY room light was gone and I made a complaint to the operator and it took a whole day to fix it. While ordering the food they usually have noting available. So, its in the nice location but the staff is terrible.

title: Hotel staff asked me if I am the photographer
desc: Hello, Notice of black list your hotel. Original appointment is at 6.10pm Wednesday 26th July 2023. To show important, I arrived at nearest public car park at 5.48pm. I arrived at your hotel no later than 6.00pm, and went to receptionist Faisal a malay guy. He tried to call your staff and got your number, and called you. He even ask my name and provided my name to you. So you should know that I am at the hotel reception area. I then went to the buffet area and walked around and left at 6.22pm. It is obvious that you bo chap me, because the hotel rooms all fully booked, so you don’t care whether I book the hotel room or not. How come you never handle phone calls properly ? And customer service properly ? It is obvious that you forgot my name immediately after the phone call.

title: Relax
desc: If you dont like to stay in the middle of crowded. Just escape to this 5 star hotel, Its very nice and luxurious. Fine resturants just adjacent to the hotel and if you like to walk a little bit, some other good resturant close by.

title: Exceptional Event Experience With Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel!
desc: The suite room was awesome. Unlimited filtered drinking water from the water dispenser. Unblock view from the highest floor. The room was spacious. The king size bed was very comfortable. The hotel guest manager Shirley was very helpful and friendly. I recently had the pleasure of hosting my ROM and it was an absolute success, all thanks to the extraordinary efforts of their Banquet Manager Razali and the Wedding Planner Serene.

title: Great hotel
desc: Great hotel! Nice view! Breakfast with so many options of food. Clean spaces and the location is so convenient, near a SMRT station. I left my bags in their luggage storage for 1 week. Vincent at the entrance area, was very helpfull!

title: Grand Copthorne Hotel
desc: The staff were attentive to our needs and they aimed to please.Front desk staff offered an amazing upgrade and offered a late checkout to fit around travel and flight arrangements. Facilities are great and location was in a great part of Singapore.

title: Wonderful Staycation
desc: Decided to book a staycation to celebrate my wedding anniversary with my hubby. One of the best decision made, was given a free upgrade to my room and an anniversary cake was given. Thanks to Shirley Chng and Kenneth who were super attentive to our needs and make use feel so welcome. Will definitely be back again.

title: Very satisfied with the service and room.
desc: The hotel was amazing. Very pretty and nice. We had a good night sleep. Bed and pillow were very comfortable. The ambience was really nice too. The room was very clean and well prepared 👍. Everything was great here. I We love our stay here ❤️. Special thanks to guest experience Manager, Shirley who gave us room upgrade for our anniversary 🌸. 5 stars to this hotel ⭐️.

title: Afternoon Tea experience
desc: Mr Raju attended to us. Seats were allocated with a scenic view of waterfront. Perfect food portion and variety. Loved the smoked duck baguette and oyster most. But tea was served in a cup instead of the usual tea pot. Hope the management will take into consideration to provide a menu and food introductory. Specially thanks to Mr Raju for his service and compliments, not forgetting an attached of "Afternoon Tea with Linabell" as promised. Hope he sees the pic.

title: Memories to remember at Grandcopthorne
desc: We had an executive club king room, stayed with my parents and kids so we had 3 rooms close to each other which was very handy on the 29th floor. The Executive team Shirley, Kenneth, Francis and Jennifer provided wonderful service and were always happy to assist us and answer questions. After a full day of touring we would visit the executive club for a well earned cup of tea which was lovely and for the canapes the team were always provided amazing service and happy to chat. We had access to 2 items of laundry a day which was great, buffet breakfast daily had a massive selection. Walking distance to Great World shopping centre, close to the hop on and off bus stop, Havelock and Great World MRT and Clarke quay. We were lucky enough to spend the last night of our trip with

title: At this room price point, not worth it.
desc: When I arrived, I waited almost 30 mins for my luggage to be sent up to my room. When it didn't arrive, I had to go down myself and bring my two suitcases up to my room. A very disappointing start to my stay. I had an early (7 am) checkout. So the previous evening, when I settled the bill, I had asked for a bellhop to help with my luggage at 650 am. No one came to my room to help with my luggage. The area provided for the buffet breakfast is too small for the size of the hotel and the number of people staying there. The one time I had breakfast there (July 8), it was packed with barely any room to walk between tables. It was also messy. The person at the entrance to the restaurant was also very brusque and unfriendly. To me, it seemed like the hotel staff were under a lot of

title: Great location
desc: Very nice and located close to everything! The staff were very friendly and helpful and the buffet breakfast was amazing! Vincent was so helpful and friendly when he assisted us with our bags when we were leaving.

title: Awesome and memorable
desc: Excellent service from Kenneth, Jennifer & Shirley at the Club lounge. They’re warm, friendly and attentive. Really made us feel very welcome and comfortable. Location of the hotel is fantastic, very close to MRT station and Great World City Shopping Mall. Very convenient to travel to anywhere!

title: Shao Lu, Shirley and Vincent
desc: Wow - these staff members have given us such stellar service that I had to name them... Shao Lu is always friendly and accomodating, and has a good memory for the things we need when she services the room everyday. Shirley always goes above and beyond to help us - spending hours helping us with room arrangements! And Vincent is fantastic and always willing to give travel advice - he diligently helps with everyones bags in the driveway, even though some are so heavy! (Honestly, I think he needs a younger team member helping him at the door). Thanks guys!

title: Mark kelk
desc: Fantastic location the staff were well trained and very helpfull and if and when we go back to Singapore the Grand Copthorne would be our first choice the only problem we had was getting out of the swimming pool the tiles were very slippery when wet

title: Clean Hotel and Good Service Staff.
desc: We really recommend this hotel. Clean and Accesible location. Staff are very nice and friendly especially Jin Liang very friendly, helpful and accomodating. Thank you Jin Liang for all your help. We will definitly come back.

title: Beautiful hotel overlooking the Singapore river.
desc: A perfect stay in an amazing hotel. The hotel really lived up to its 5 star rating. We had a free upgrade on our room. Breakfast was delicious and the staff could not have been more helpful. Raju at the restaurant and bar gave us great tips on where to see the light show and view of the city. Shirley on floor 29 was wonderful and always greeted us with a smile and by name. She helped us with our check out and bags and even helped us with our transfer to the next hotel via the doctors surgery.

title: Great stay along the river.
desc: Very comfortable upgraded hotel with great helpful employees especially Maja from the front desk. She was accommodating. Breakfast and food selections was wonderful. Stayed here a week for business and would recommend staying here again.

title: Excellent service, definitely recommend staying
desc: The hotel staff were most helpful and made our stay at the hotel a fantastic one. Special shout-out to Jennifer and Kenneth for their stellar service! Kenneth helped with our luggage and directed us to our room on our check-in, always having a warm smile on his face. Jennifer was cheerful and serve me warm water knowing I was feeling under the weather. Definitely a sweet and thoughtful gesture! I know I will be back again!!

title: Fantastic Experience
desc: Upon chech in the staff Anil Singh effortlessly helped me settle into my beautifully appointed room. The attention to cleanliness and maintenance was exceptional with every inch reflecting meticulous care. The room boasted ultra-modern amenities. Appreciated a very excellent service.

title: Not bad but not best
desc: Go for BD celebration and they promise complimentary BD cake and didn't deliver until I go back 😒 No enough tissue for general use and no have disposable slippers in the room , check in was nice and but take longer than expected

title: Grand Hotel
desc: As a receptionist at the hotel, Anil Singh has consistently demonstrated remarkable professionalism and competence in handling guest interactions and administrative tasks. His exceptional customer service skills have greatly contributed to the overall satisfaction for me. Anil is extremely friendly and approachable, creating a welcoming atmosphere for me. He goes above and beyond to assist them with my inquiries and requests promptly and efficiently. Anil possesses excellent communication skills, both in person and over the phone, making sure that guests feel valued and well-assisted throughout their stay. Anil's organizational skills are commendable, as he effortlessly manages guest reservations, check-ins, and check-outs. He pays close attention to detail, ensuring that all

title: Best choice!!
desc: It was one of the best choice in this trip!! Shirley Chng(the manager) was super kind and nice, and my family enjoyed staying at the hotel without any problem! It was a lot better to stay in calm, quiet riverside instead of noisy places for tourist. And it was just 15min’s walk to Clarke Quey. We will absolutely choose this hotel again next time :) One more, the cocktails at the bar was also great with reasonable price.

title: Wedding experience
desc: Shirley has been really helpful and made the experience a wonderful one. I had my wedding at their property and Shirley was the one attended to us. 10/10 would return to the newly renovated hotel again.

title: Good Location
desc: Good location near havelock MRT, Clean renovated rooms Crowded breakfast but lot of variety and staffs make sure you get a seat at the earliest and allow you to stay even after close of breakfast time. Overall good family stay.

title: Luxurious stay near Robertson Quay
desc: High quality luxury hotel. Our room was large, including separate lounge and large bathroom. Spotlessly clean, with full length windows to enjoy the view. A perfect, cool oasis to retreat to from the heat of the streets. Also close to restaurants and bars on Robertson Quay and 300m from the nearest MRT station.

title: A convenient location
desc: Easy access to buses and MRT trains. Nearby local districts have nice local food. The rooms are newly decorated. One of the elevators has some mild noise. The breakfast package is money-worthy. Check-out takes time.

title: Rating
desc: Breakfast amazing, staff helpful, rooms are big. Unfortunately not well isolated doors so you hear every door opening and closing in the corridor which is quite noisy. The bed sheets and towels weren’t fully clean.

title: Good Hotel
desc: Very welcoming staff. Nice rooms VINCCENT was amazing and helpful. Room was spacious. Nice gym and swimming pool Excellent food. Very good location near a shopping mall. Good service. Will come back

title: Great hotel. Vincent is so heloful
desc: Second stay at Grand Copthorne Waterfront. We love the hotel. The staff are friendly and helpful. Special mention to Vincent one of the concierge staff. He is always happy to help and offer advice on tourist spots. Vincent is really friendly and great at his jobs. The Durian Dinner was amazing. We will be back. Thanks.

title: An absolute must stay in Singapore
desc: We stayed at the Grand Copthorne for 7 nights and it was amazing. Between the views, amenities, inclusions, and bed, the entire experience was above what we anticipated. The service we received from all staff was impeccable but with special mention to Kenneth, Jennifer, and Shirley. They always went above and beyond and were lovely to interact with every day. They made our stay in Singapore extra special. I’m looking forward to staying here again very soon!

title: Very good location, but extremely noise room
desc: Whereas the hotel facilities are well, and hotel is clean, my room was very close to the elevators. Hence this proximity the room was very noise. Sleeping in the room likes sleeping on the airstrip. Also if you need invoice do not use speed check-out, because you need to contact to have your invoice.

title: Not quite 5 star
desc: Nicely decorated large room with waterfront view. Good location within walking distance to many quayside restaurants and cafes. 5 mins walk to the closest MRT station. Love the in room water filter rather than bottled water. Well equipped gym. Disappointed about the absence of a mini bar in the room and very limited tea amenities - only 1 tea bag was provided. Nice large conference room area. Food catering was delicious and well balanced.

title: Wonderful 1 night stopover on our way to Europe.
desc: Travelling with our daughter, son in law and 1 year old granddaughter, we decided to book a stopover to have a rest before our long haul 12.5hr flight. Not our usual go to hotel in Singapore but we absolutely loved our stay and will definitely be back. Everything was great, from friendly, helpful staff to comfortable beds and pillows and lovely meals. Thank you to Nizam on the front desk who helped us with some queries and questions on a busy day checking in. We enjoyed a swim in the pool the next day before heading out to dinner and then our connecting flight. They have an area where you can have a shower etc after a swim if you've checked out and have later flight, as was our case. Only 1 thing I'd like to see and that's:- real milk in your room for tea (my go to drink) or

title: Great experience.
desc: My family and I stayed in this beautiful hotel 2 weeks ago. We had an awesome time in Singapore. I already started to plan my next visit. I would like to recommend the hotel and especially Vincent who was very friendly and helpful. See you next time.

title: Wonderful hotel in Singapore
desc: A superb hotel in the heart of Singapore. Many landmark locations within walking distance including a famous Hawker Market with incredible street food. The hotel's food offerings are also very impressive - the buffet breakfast is first class. The hotel's outdoor swimming pool is perfect for watching the sunset. The rooms and common areas are all spotlessly clean and well maintained. The staff are very professional and friendly. All-in-all, a great hotel.

title: Excellent
desc: Beautiful hotel, excellent customer service, impressive daily housekeeping. Always accommodating and quick to respond. All staff members were friendly, attentive, and polite. I only wish, for the price, breakfast was included.

title: Very pleasant and relaxing stay in Singapore
desc: I love the location for rest and walks in the evening. The location is close to Robertson Quay and a short walk to the vibrant Clarke Quay. The hotel rooms are really nice. This time we stayed in an apartment with a huge deck, beside the tennis courts. It was so relaxing to sit outside at night and then later go for a walk along the river. The staff are always super friendly and very helpful. My wife and I love the hotel and location, away from the hustle and bustle.

title: Poor
desc: It's almost 4 weeks since I stayed at this hotel. I am still waiting for my 2500 SGD refund back. Have emailed the hotel, no reply. I am thinking of taking legal action. I never expected a pathetic experience from this sort of management.

title: I enjoyed my stay and will recommend the hotel to friends and family members to friends and family members
desc: I enjoyed my stay in the hotel and will recommend it to family and friends because of the positive experience I had staying at the hotel. What I like most is the testy food, the clean environment, friendly staff and the location of the hotel

title: TRIBBLE HOTEL OF SINGAPORE
desc: Never Never Again. Very rude staff, they are very irresponsible, they lost my food order of grab which was delivered in lobby. I come to talk no one entertain us, they were not even correctly replied. I dont like staff of the hotel, rooms are very small and no tables for doing lunch or dinner. We reached here after a long tired day with couple of flight, we have paid $$ but still no staff of carrying our luggage to room. I NEVER RECOMMEND

title: Fantastic hotel! Our new 'go-to' favourite in Singapore. 😊
desc: We previously stayed at other hotels in Singapore, closer to the Bay, however recently discovered that there is now an MRT (underground rail) station at Havelock, 200 metres from the Grand Copthorne Waterfront hotel, that gives direct access to Gardens By The Bay and the rest of Singapore with connecting stations along the route. Deciding to try this option out, I can assure you we weren't disappointed. Every aspect of this hotel ticked the 'right' boxes. From generous-sized rooms to attentive staff, to the quality of breakfasts, restaurant options and fantastic outlook, there was nothing that we didn't love. A special 'thanks' to Shirley Chng, a customer service manager, for her easy-going and helpful manner, who made our stay comfortable and relaxing and demonstrated that we

title: Great hotel
desc: It's a great hotel with a very good location on the riverside. I definitely should not forget to mention Vincent who was very polite and helpful calling us a taxi every day and giving us tips on where to go and how to get there. Thank you!

title: Vincent was very friendly and personable
desc: Nice hotel - great location and lovely wee walk to Robertson Quay. Gym small but very functional and was clean and tidy. Highlight was my checkout where Vincent looked after me in the taxi rank and left with a smile :)

title: Excellent for visitors
desc: Nice clean hotel. Excellent executive lounge on the 29th floor. Food in the lounge including breakfast (away from the busy first floor restaurant) was good. Jennifer, Shirley and Kenneth were excellent at looking after the customers. The individual rooms were adequate, well maintained and managed on a daily basis at the very least. Large TV in the room suffered from a lack of wide variety of channels, but had the ability to mirror your handheld and other devices (android and IOS). Very central location on the banks of the Singapore river, from which one can walk all the way to the Marina, gardens by the bay and other attractions without using a taxi, past an array of river bank pubs and restaurants. Vibrant neighbourhood at night. All in all a great location, excellent hotel

title: Go for the hotel, stay for Vincent
desc: Vincent is as an absolute asset. Gave me help when he saw me confused. Wish everyone was like Vincent. Thank you!! He obviously knows the city very well and was there to greet me on my return too. A wonderful introduction to Singapore.

title: Stay on 5 Aug
desc: Stay was great and pleasant. Shirley, Kenneth, and Jennifer were very friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and the facilities were good. Checking-in and out was a breeze too. Am sure to return.

title: Highly recommend
desc: Amazing view from 25th floor Nice space Thank you to all the team for making my stay memorable and warm my heart with your services. Especially thank to house keeping team. I always feel so fresh and relax after a long day ( I didnt asked her name but she is so kind and sweet . She wear eyeglasses and black hair with a bang I met in 8aug at 11:50) and also to Mr. Vincent for his assist and sweet farewell.

title: Wonderful Hotel
desc: Stayed 3 nights enroute to Bali. Wonderful hotel with kind staff. Clean, efficient, welcoming. Thoroughly recommended. Rooms was clean and quiet Vincent the doorman is a character and so polite and helpful. 👍

title: The experience of grand copthorne waterfront is more likely four points instead of five points.
desc: There is no towel for hand washing. No small hair conditioner or body lotion. No bottles of water (only drinking machine in the room). Overall the experience is fine. The view of the room is good (22 floor).

title: Excellent hotel but no/very less Indian food option
desc: We visited from July end to aug start ‘23. Checkin is not very comfortable as you have to wait till 3 pm and they don’t call you , you have to stand in queue and again and again ask them if room is ready. This is sometime not inline with 5star hotel which generally are very guest friendly. On our request that we have small baby so if they could expedite, the reply received is that “we have pregnant ladies, other small kids and all have to wait”. We can’t do much. We thought this was very wrong statement by them especially for a 5 star hotel. However as we didn’t have any option , so we waited. Finally we were allotted room and thanks to them that they allotted our 30th floor with vey nyc view. Rest of the thing at hotel was very good. Person from gift shop was very rude. Other

title: Very good experience and excellent location
desc: Good service from a very competent group of professionals. Vincent was always such a gentleman and was always on hand to give helpful tips and advice on places to go and things to do in Singapore. Very enjoyable stay

title: Teriffic stay
desc: Fantastic place to stay. Great location, clean renovated rooms. Staff was lovely. Happy we stayed there, much better than another Millenium property we stayed at on this trip. Would absolutely return.

title: Fantastic stay
desc: Location was brilliant, right near the MRT and along the river where we could see otters and turtles from our room! Breakfast was a smart inclusion. Very lovely experience at this hotel. We will be back!

title: Comfortable stay
desc: We had an enjoyable stay at the Grand Copthorne. The room was comfortable, the breakfast was great and the concierge team were excellent. We stayed with our son for 2 nights. The riverside location was peaceful.

title: Not Bad
desc: Overall, this Hotel is good value for money. The refurbished rooms are well designed, they feel larger than they actually are. But the little table is far too little! Difficult for two persons to dine in the room. Checking in can be tedious but there is express checkout.

title: Excellent visit to Grand Copthorne Waterfront Singapore
desc: Loved the ambience, cleanliness, excellent breakfast. Also we experienced great service from Vincent at Concierge and other concierge staff. Also helpful reservations staff on the phone as the My Milllenium website was not working to do the online booking at the member rate. Lovely location at the river Highly recommend

title: Clean room with good view, but breakfast was chaotic
desc: Love the suite room that was recently renovated with the carpets being removed. The view was awesome because we were assigned to high floor. It was my first stay here despite having school D&D and attended friend's wedding in this hotel years ago. Special thanks to Club lounge staff (Jennifer, Kenneth & Shirley) who attended to us during our stay. They're professional and polite, serving us drinks promptly. Will recommend families/ friends to stay this hotel but the breakfast scene was too chaotic for our liking.

title: Lovely hotel with beautifull views in Singapore
desc: Nice and comfortable hotel. I really enjoyed my room, the spaciousness and the beautifull view. The bathrooms are quite small, but have what you need, except bodylotion. Staff were friendly and everyrhing went smoothly. The only thing I missed was plantbased options for breakfast (milk, yoghurt, cheese etc) and clear signing of which dishes were vegan, vegetarian etc.

title: Week-long vacation in Singapore
desc: My family was lucky to get this hotel even with last minute booking through their website. The Grand Copthorne Waterfront made our trip extra special with excellent service and great view from the room. Walking distance to the train, bus stops, Zion Hawker and the Great World Mall with both asian and western grocery options!

title: Highly recommended hotel
desc: Wonderful hotel and excellent stay. We visited with family (1 parent and 2 teenagers) and stay in a nice suite with riverview on the 27th floor. Additional we had all day lounge acces, which was very convenient for the kids as I had a professional meeting for a few days. Snacks and drinks available all day with super helpful staff. Clean room, recently redone, super friendly and helpful staff; great breakfast with many food options. The hotel is vey centrally located close to Singapore river and close to public transportation (that is very organized in Singapore).

title: Visit during a conference
desc: I visited there regarding my conference. Hotel connectivity is good. But heavy demand for vehicles during peak hours. Mr Vincent who was the security there did a timely help for me to hire vehicle during an regency situation. Thanks a lot for professional behaviour!

title: Great hotel with the best staff.
desc: My wife and I stayed for a couple of days during a stopover. The Grand Copthorne is a beautiful hotel with great facilities and the most wonderful staff. A huge big thank you to Jennifer and Cheryl on level 29 who made our stay so enjoyable. These two ladies were welcoming, with great service. They handled our requests delightfully and made us feel like special guests. As my wife and I are celebrating our 30th anniversary we were hoping for something special, and the service provided by Jennifer and Cheryl really was special. Thank you. The other facilities of the hotel are superb. The gym has a great range of equipment including a full rack, multiple Olympic bars and a reasonable amount of free weights. The normal cardio equipment is provided. The pool is a good size

title: Grand Copthorne Executive Lounge worth visiting for business or pleasure
desc: Modern Hotel with executive lounge on 29th floor. Lounge well-catered with cocktail hour in the evening. Pleasing and relaxing decor. Breakfast in the lounge provided a good choice of hot and cold food freshly prepared on site. Food offerings in the evening was plentiful and varied. Good selection of drinks offered between 18.00 and 20.00. The lounge staff are exceptional…….friendly, knowledgeable and efficient. Special thanks to Jennifer, Shirley and Kenneth who worked hard to make every guest feel special. Would return again for business or pleasure without hesitation!

title: Best stay here!
desc: My partner and i had our wedding here and it was beautiful! Newly renovated ballroom and rooms. We were given a 2 night stay with access to the lounge + breakfast. The service was exceptional and we were well taken care of! Thank you to Shirley and Joni for giving us such a pleasant stay at Grand Corpthorne.

title: Familial Warmth
desc: I was on a business trip and the Executive Lounge was my place to chill and spend “me” time. The staff on duty really took care of me to ensure that my needs were met. I like the privacy I had and at the same time, they made me feel the warmth like family.

title: General Review
desc: Fantastic services and very recommended Hotel!! They have good quality of room furniture, clean and tidy room, also good quality of the food. Appreciate to Vincent who always helping everyone on the main entrance 😀

title: very satisfied
desc: The Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel is one of the best hotels in Singapore. The price and the performance offered are right here. Modern facilities and very friendly and helpful staff. The good location on the water and the nearby MRT station are very important. Many thanks to Shirley from Guest Relations.

title: Great stay
desc: Had great stay very nice room and facilities in the hotel and great staff especially Vincent who helped me whenever I needed anything. Nice buffet restaurant for breakfast lunch and dinner also available and has a wide variety of food available

title: Great nights sleep
desc: Cool location and immaculate rooms, very good value for money and the cherry on top was Vincent the door man, very helpful man and he's a testament to the good nature of all the staff Happily stay there again

title: Great hotel indeed
desc: Great hotel. Location near great world MRT station... The room is spacious and clean. Most important thing is the hotel provide us with freeflow drink water. Save my energy, no need to buy and carry bottled water every other day.. Thanks Mr.Anil for our room upgrade. I cannot thank u enough..

title: Pleasant stay in GCW
desc: We felt really welcomed at our recent stay at the hotel. The guest experience manager, Shirly, was very pleasant and had taken extra care of our needs very well, incl providing us a slide of birthday cake for my daughter. Besides, we were treated to a complimentary use at the executive lounge. The room was very well decorated, spacious and clean. Amenities such as TV with smart features, wifi, nice toilets, etc were all available and adequately equipped. Thank you for a memorable and pleasant stay in GCW!

title: Holiday
desc: Perfect Hotel with perfect location in Singapore close to Robertson and Clarke’s Quay and its restaurant and bars. Perfect stop over to break up the long trip from Europe to Australia. Would and will recommend to all of my family and friends
